Wɔ saa nkabomkuo ase no, Ethiopia man no bɛgyinaaeɛ san dii yie nanso na nsɛmmisa wɔ nipa fahodie ne kabi-ma-menka bi ho.
Awieɛ no, nea nnipa nnye ho no bɛdanee ɔyɛkyerɛ maa aban sesaa nneɛma mu hwɛɛ maa wɔyii Mr Abiy sɛ Aban Panin.
Mr Abiy sesaa amanbuo mu tee kuo foforɔ (Prosperity Party) tuu Tigray aban mu mpaninfoɔ adeɛ so san bɔɔ wɔn kwaadu sɛ wadi dwirim ne wahyɛ nipa so.
Saa berɛ yi ara mu no, Mr Abiy hwɛ maa asaase ho ntɔkwa a na ɛda wɔn ne Eritrea ntam no baa awieɛ, yei maa no nyaa Nobel Peace Prize wɔ afe 2019 mu
Saa ntotoeɛ yi maa Mr Abiy nyaa manfoɔ abasobɔdeɛ nanso ɛde ɔhaw baa wɔn a na wɔbɔ n'akyi wɔ Tigray mu.
Tigray mpaninfoɔ nhuu Mr. Abiy nsakraeɛ yi sɛ kwan a ɔrefa so asɛe Ethiopia amanbuo nhyehyɛeɛ no na ɔde tumi no nyinaa ara aba ne nsam.
Ntɔkwa no mu yɛ kɛse wɔ Ɛbɔ bosome no mu berɛ a Tigray buu aban mmara so too wɔn nkoara mantam aba.
Aban kɛseɛ no tuu abatoɔ no hyɛɛ da ɛnam corona virus yareɛ no nti kyerɛɛ sɛ wabu mmara so.
Ɔ ko no mu yɛɛ den berɛ a aban no gyaee sika a na ɔde ma Tigray san twaa ayɔnkofa a na ɛda wɔn ntam wɔ Ahinime bosome mu.
Saa berɛ no Tigray mpaninfoɔ no kaa sɛ yei kyerɛ sɛ "wasuae ɔko"
Ɔ haw no payaa ne mu maa ɛwieeɛ no wɔbɔɔ Tigray akofoɔ no kwaadu sɛ wato ahyɛ asraafoɔ so awia wɔn akodeɛ
Mr Abiy kaa sɛ Tigray traa "ahoma kɔkɔɔ no."
Ɔ kaa sɛ afei ayɛ ɔhyɛ ama aban no sɛ wɔne asraafoɔ no si ani.
Wayi Algeria Sikasɛm Soafoɔ Ayman Benabderrahmane sɛ ɔman no aban panin foforɔ berɛ a mmarahyɛbɛdwafie too aba a nnipa kakra bi pɛ na baa abɔnten bɛtooe bosome ahyaseɛ no
Afei ɛwɔ sɛ Mr. Benabderrahmane a na ɔyɛ Sikakorabea Kɛseɛ panin no te aban foforɔ a ɛbɛhwɛ atoto Abibirem Atifi man no sikasɛm a ayɛ basaa no.
Fango ne gyaframa ho sika a aba fam ne corona virus yareɛ no ama nsakraeɛ bɔhyɛ a Manpanin Abdelmajid Tebboune hyɛɛeɛ berɛ a ɔbɛdii adeɛ bosome du nnwɔtwe ayɛ den sɛ ɔbɛdi so.
Kramofoɔ kuo a wɔtɔɔ so mmiɛnsa wɔ abatoɔ no mu se wɔn nso bɛka aban foforɔ no ho.
Ɛwɔ sɛ aban mu panin foforɔ a wayi no yi abisadeɛ a ɔyɛkyerɛ kuo bi a agye din a wɔfrɛ wɔn Hirak de ato n'anim sɛ ɔnyɛ nsakraeɛ wɔ amanbuo no mu.
ɛde ɔmampanin daa Abdelaziz Bouteflika amammuo no baa awieeɛ wɔ 2019 mu.
Hirakfoɔ da so rekyerɛ sɛ obi nkɔtɔ aba no na wɔda so reyɛ ɔyɛkyerɛ wɔn nkuro ahodoɔ so wɔ ɔman no mu.
Nnipa yiedie kuo ahodoɔ de ato dwa sɛ, wɔakye wɔn kuo mma bebree de wɔn akɔgyina kɔɔto anim, na wɔde bi nso agu afiase.
Namibia mampanin Hage Geingob kyerɛ sɛ ɔman no wɔ ahohiahia mu ɛsiane nnipa dodoɔ a Coronavirus aku wɔn wɔn ɔman no mu, na kɔɔ ara na ɛrekɔ soro.
ɔde n’anodisɛm reto ɔman no anim no, ɔkyerɛ sɛ Namibiafoɔ 513 na Coronavirus no aku wɔn nna dunum ntɛm ni, na nnipa a wɔawu firi Kɔtɔnima no abɔ ho mmiɛnsa.
Wei yɛ owuo adi ɔman no nya pa ara ɛsiane sɛ wɔn dodoɔ nyinaa yɛ 2.5M.
ɔde nhyehyɛeɛ foforɔ regu kwan sɛ onipa ntumi mfiri kuro foforɔ so nkɔ kuro foforɔ so no, Mr Geingob de too dwa sɛ nnoɔma bɛtumi agye nsam kɔsi bosome a ɛtɔ so nwɔtwe no.
ɔmampanin no kasa wieeɛ no, ɔsoafoɔ a ɔhwɛ apɔmmuden nsɛm so, Kalumbi Shangula de too dwa sɛ, ɔman no rebrɛ sɛ ɛbɛtena ase... Yɛreko agye wɔn ara kra.
ɔde too dwa sɛ, ɔman no mmɔkyire mu nyinaa ayɛ ma.
ɔsoafoɔ no de kaa ho sɛ, wɔde mpa bebree reba na afei nso wɔde mfidie a ɛma nnipa mframa ma wɔhome nso bɛba.
ɔde n’asɛm reba awieeɛ no, ɔmampanin Geingob srɛɛ nnipa no sɛ wɔnni mmara a wɔde aba no so, afei nso ɔgye di sɛ ɔman no bɛfa ne ntoma afira.
Wɔde barima a wɔde no firii Netherlands baa Rwanda no akɔtɔ afiase mfeɛ du-num ɛnam nnipa a ɔkuu wɔn berɛ a na wadi mfeɛ du-nkron.
ɔredi ɛean-ɔlaude Iyamuremye asɛm no, ɔde too dwa sɛ ɔnnim 1994 Tutsis ne Hutus nnipa bɛyɛ 8000 a wɔwuiiɛ no ho hwee.
Haekɔɔto no kyerɛ sɛ Iyamuremye ka Hutufoɔ a wɔkuu nnipa a wɔte Tutsi wɔ Kigali no ho bi.
Barima a wadi mfeɛ aduana num kaa n’asɛm sɛ ne maame mpo yɛ Tutsini.
ɔtemmuafoɔ no de too dwa sɛ nka wɔbɛtumi de Iyamuremye akɔ afiase ne kwa nna nyinaa nanso ɔnyɛ saa ɛfiri na ɔyɛ abɔfra na ɔdii saa bɔne no, na afei nso ɔgyee Tutsifoɔ no bi nkwa.
Wɔkyee Iyamuremye wɔ Netherlands wɔ 2013 mu. Na ɔyɛ drɔbani wɔ Israel ne Finland ɛmbasi.
Dutɔh man no de no kɔɔ Rwanda 2016 mu.

Wɔakye Jihad nnipa a baanu sɛ wɔnim nnipa a wɔwuii wɔ Solhan basabasaeɛ a ɛwɔ Burkina Faso atifi-apueeɛ fam no ho bi. Saa awerɛhosɛm yi sii bosome a ɛtɔ so nsia ne da a ɛtɔ so nnan a nnipa 130 hweree wɔn nkwa.
Kwaadubɔfoɔ de too dwa sɛ wɔakye nnipa baanu a wɔdi mfeɛ aduonu nwɔtwe.
Wɔn baanu no nyinaa kyerɛ sɛ wɔka Mouhadine kuo a ɛkyerɛ sɛ Nnipa nkabom no ho a wɔsusu sɛ ɛyɛ al-Qaeda kuo no mu baako.
Wɔkyekyɛ mu akuo bebree a wɔwɔ Burkina Faso na wɔayɛ basabasaeɛ bebree wɔ Niger ne Benin.
Kwaadubɔfoɔ no kaa sɛ wɔn na wɔmaa basabasaeɛ kɔɔ so wɔ Solhan, Sebba, Boundore ne Koholoko wɔ Niger ahyeɛ so.
Kwaadubɔfoɔ no asrɛ sɛ wɔnyɛ nhwehwɛmu mfa asɛm yi ho.
Wɔkyerɛ sɛ basabasaeɛ a ɛkɔɔ so wɔ Solhan akuraa hɔ no yɛ basabasaeɛ a ɛyɛ awerɛhosɛm pa ara asi wɔ Burkina Faso firi Oforisuo wɔ 2015 mu.
Ama nnipa bebree nnye ne sɛ bammɔkuo ahodoɔ a wɔwɔ ɔman no mu bɛtumi asi Jihadfoɔ basabasaeɛ ano wɔ ɔman no mu.
ɔmampanin Roɔh Marɔ ɔhristian Kabore de too dwa Kwasiada anwummerɛ wɔ kasafidie ne TV so sɛ, ɔhyɛ bɔ sɛ ɔde asraafoɔ dodoɔ bɛkɔ beaeɛ nsɛm yi rekɔ so no.
Engirisi asraafoɔ bɛyɛ 300 na wɔde wɔn aba Mali ɛsiane Islamic State kuo (IS) a wɔafiri Middle East aba Africa no nti.
Mfeɛ mmiɛnsa anisoadehunu a ɛsi wɔn ani a wɔto ne din Operation Newɔombe no, UN asraafoɔ bɛyɛ 15,000 a France da anim no reboa sɛ asomdwoeɛ bɛba Sahel.
Mali ka Sahel aman a wɔne Jihadfoɔ de abɔ anim no na basabasaeɛ a wɔrekɔ so nyɛ koraa.
Global Terrorism Index a ɔde baa Obubuo da a ɛtɔ so 25 kyerɛ sɛ, Islamic State kuo IS afiri Middle East aba Abibirem ne South Asia a nnipa a wɔkumm wɔ wɔn Saharan-Africa akɔ n’anim 67%.
Global Terrorism Index amannebɔ ne sɛ, ISIS kuo ahodoɔ a aba Sub-Saharan Africa no na ama basabasaeɛ aba aman a wɔwɔ saa beaeɛ hɔ no mu.
Aman nson a basabasaeɛ aba mu pa ara wɔ Sub-Saharan Africa ne Burkina Faso, Mozambique, DRɔ, Mali, Niger, Cameroon ne Ethiopia.
Amannebɔ no kyerɛ sɛ 2019 mu no, sub-Saharan Africa na ISIS basabasaeɛ kɛseɛ no ara kɔɔ so maa nnipa 982 hweree wɔn nkwa.
Jihadfoɔ dwumadie wɔ Abibiman no akyɛ.
Al-Qaeda kannifoɔ Osama Bin Laden de bɛtenaa Sudan ansa na ɔresan akɔ Afghanistan wɔ 1996 mu.
Nigeria Boko Haram kuo no nso a wɔakyee sukuu mmaa wɔ Chibok wɔ 2014 mu no nso nam Jihad so yɛɛ basabasaeɛ bebreee wɔ 2010 mu.
Na nnɛ deɛ, sɛdeɛ akuo ahodoɔ ne Jihad kuo de abɔm no, basabasaeɛ wɔ beaeɛ hɔ rekɔ soro.
US State Department for ɔounter-Terrorism kɔɔdinɛta, Ambassador Nathan Sales kyerɛ sɛ IS ne al-Qaeda dwumadie no afiri Syria ne Iraq akɔ West ne East Africa ne Afghanistan.
ɔkyerɛ sɛ, Africa na abɛdi kan sɛ ɛba beaeɛ a wɔbɛsi basabasaeɛ ano a.

Nanso, ɛnyɛ aban no ne saa basabasaeɛfoɔ nko ara na wɔde abɔm; al-Qaeda ne IS akyitaafoɔ nso de abɔm a ɛnyɛ ketewa koraa na ano ayɛ den pa ara a French Jihad nimdefoɔ, Oliver Guitta a ɔwɔ GlobalStrat Risk ɔonsultanɔy ahyɛ nkɔm sɛ:
Mfeɛ aduonu a ɛda yɛn anim yi, Africa bɛtu Middle East, na ɛhɔ na Jihad basabasaeɛ no bɛkɔ so pa ara.
Al-Qaeda ne IS nyinaa mpɛ wɔmpɛ akannifoɔ a wɔfrɛ wɔ apostates no asɛm.
Nanso sɛdeɛ wɔyɛ wɔn nnoɔma no bɔ abira.
IS basabasaeɛ a wɔyɛ no ano yɛ den pa ara.
Wei ma atuterafoɔ ne nnipabɔnefoɔ na wɔdi kuo no anim, na afei nso wɔpɛ sɛ wɔka Nkramofoɔ dodoɔ no ara nso hyɛ.
Al-Qaeda ne akuo ahodoɔ a wɔhyɛ wɔn ase botaeɛ ne kuro mma a wɔnni awerɛhyɛm biara wɔ aban no amammuo ne apolisifoɔ no mu bɛtae wɔn akyi a, na wɔgyina so deɛ wei ayɛ deɛ wɔpɛ sɛ wɔyɛ.
Wiase aman ahodoɔ a wɔnni sika dodoɔ no ara bɛn Sahara desert.
Wɔfrɛ saa beaeɛ yi the Sahel, na Arabic kasa no mu ɛkyerɛ the ɔoast.
Aman a wɔwɔ Sahel borɔno so ne Mali, Chad, Niger, Burkina Faso ne Mauritania, na basabasaeɛ bebree na akɔ so wɔ saa aman yi mu.
Nsukɔm, hia, kɛtɛasehyɛ ne adwuama a ɛho ayɛ den na ɛreku wɔn a wɔte borɔno hɔ.
Ambasada Sales kyerɛ sɛ, West Africa yɛ beaeɛ a aman no nni wɔn nsaase so tumi, asraafoɔ tiatia nnipa fahodie so na wɔn ahyeɛ so nso ho bammɔ wɔ fam.
Jihad kuo a wɔdi dwuma pa ara wɔ borɔno yi so ne ɛama’at Nusrat Al-Islam wa’l-Muslimin (ɛNIMɔ a ɛhyɛ al-Qaeda ase.
Saa kuo yi Islamic State in the Great Sahara (ISGSɔ a ɛhyɛ IS ase na wɔrepere so wɔ borɔno yi so. Afe yi deɛ, ntɔkwa pii nkɔɔ so wɔ wɔn ntam.
Nigeria abere wɔ Jihad basabasaeɛ nsa no, na aban no ntumi ma biara ntɔ n’akwan mu wɔ ɔman no atifi-apueeɛ fam. ɛhɔ na Boko Haram kuo hyɛɛ aseɛ.

Global Terrorism Index kyerɛ sɛ Boko Haram ama nnipa 37,500 na ahwere wɔn nkwan a nnipa wɔboro 19,000 na awuo wɔ Nigeria ɛfiri 2011 reba no. Na nyɛ Nigeria nko, na mmom aman a wɔne no bɔ ahyeɛ nso ka ho.
Afe 2015 mu no, Boko Haram fa bi kɔhyɛɛ IS ase a wɔbɛfrɛ wɔn ho Islamic State West Africa Provinɔe (Iswapɔ a wɔtwa ahyeɛ a wɔmmrɛ ho kɔfa aman sɔɔso wɔ Lake Chad wɔ 2018 mu.
ɛfiri hɔ na IS rebɔ n’akuo no fa a ɛwɔ Abibiman mu kyidɔm.

Basabasaeɛ rekɔ so wɔ Boko Haram din mu. Ekuo bi de mfonini bi baa abɔntene ɔpɛnimaa da a ɛdi kan a a wɔkyerɛ sɛ wɔn na wɔkumm akuafoɔ bebree wɔ Borno State. Wɔkyerɛ sɛ wɔne aban asraafoɔ na ɛdii saa dwuma no.
Asraafoɔ ne infomɛhyin kakra bi na aman wɔwɔ Europe de aboa Nigeria. Wɔkyerɛ sɛ kɛtɛasehyɛ ne nnipa yiedie a Nigeria asraafoɔ no tiatia so nti na wɔntumi mmoa Nigeria sɛdeɛ ɛwɔ sɛ wɔyɛ.
Wei nyinaa ka ho bi na wɔnnye aban no nnie na nnipa dodoɔ no ara de wɔn ho kɔdɔm Boko Haram ne Jihad akuo ahodoɔ wɔ borɔno no so.
Oliver Guitta se, Kɛtɛasehyɛ a ɛwɔ Nigeria na resɛe biribiara.
Al-Qaeda basabasaeɛ no hyɛɛ aseɛ wɔ Algeria.
Nti ɛnyɛ nwanwa sɛ kannifoɔ foforɔ a Al-Qaeda wɔ Islamic Magreb (AQIMɔ firi Algeria.
Abu Obaida Al-Annabi abɛhyɛ Adbelmalik Droukdel a France asraafoɔ kumm no wɔ Mali wɔ bosome a ɛtɔ so nsia mu no anan.
Al-Qaeda akyitaafoɔ ani agye sɛ wɔayi no sɛ kannifoɔ, ɛnna IS akyitaafoɔ nso sɛ wɔnnye ne Jihad ho abɔdin ntom.
Tunisia a ɛyɛ ɔman a ɛso wɔ borɔno no so de nnipa dodoɔ pa ara (15 kɔsi 20,000ɔ a wɔn ankasa kɔɔ Syria de wɔn ho kɔdɔm IS kuo firi 2013 kɔsi 2018.
Basabasaeɛ pii na ɛrekɔ wɔ Tunisia.
Basabasaeɛ pii na ɛrekɔ so wɔ Libya firi berɛ a Arab Spring Revolt tuu Muammar Gaddafi adeɛ so.
N’amammuo no baeɛ awieeɛ ma ho kwan mma atuo ne topaeɛ bebree firi aban no akakye kɔɔ Sahel aman so. Wei maa IS Jihadfoɔ no ho yɛɛ den wɔ Libya apueeɛ fam.
Somalia kuo al-Shabab kuo a ɛkyerɛ mmabunu wɔ Arab kasa no mu no yɛ Jihad kuo baako a wɔwɔ ho yɛ hu wɔ Abibirem.
Nathan Sales kyerɛ sɛ, Al-Shabab kuo no hunu ne ho sɛ ɛyɛ al-Qaeda kuo a wɔn mmɔdemmɔ wɔ soro pa ara.
Aman ahodoɔ bebree na wɔapɛ sɛ wɔbɛtu wɔn ase nanso nyɛ Al-Shababfoɔ atumi aduru Kenya ne Uganda, na wɔsan ato topaeɛ wɔ Somali ahenkuro Mogadishu mu.
US Speɔial Operations topaeɛ a wɔto firii Dɛibouti kumm al-Shabab akannifoɔ nyinaa nso ekuo no atumi asɔre bio.
Wɔatumi nso adi kuo a ɛhyɛ IS aseɛ a siesie wɔkɔhyɛ Horn of Africa atifi-apueeɛ fam.
IS nyaa wɔnyaa atifi mansini mu wɔ ɔapo Delgado yɛ basabasaeɛ ho nhwɛsoɔ baako a wɔhyehyɛɛ biribiara wɔ intɛnɛt so.
Aban no mu nnipa kyerɛ sɛ Jihadfoɔ a wɔredi dwuma wɔ Mozambique no faa intɛnɛt no so na wɔfaa nnipa firii Tanzania a IS foɔ wɔwɔ Syria ne Irag ankasa amma hɔ.
Amannebɔ pii na ɛbɔ abira wɔ basabasaeɛ a ɛsiiɛ wɔ ɔabo Delgado wɔ IS din mu a nnipa aduonum firii wɔn nkwa wɔ agopramma so.
Nanso IS kuo no nsa da aban no so.
Oliver Guitta se, IS nam Mozambique mu a asraafoɔ ntumi nyɛ wɔn hwee.
Wei bɛma basabasaeɛ aba.
G7 nhyiamu a ɛkɔɔ so wɔ Loɔh Erne bosome a ɛtɔ so nsia no mu wɔ 2013 mu no, G7 sae kɔntraagyi sɛ wɔntua sika a basabasaeɛ kuo ahodoɔ no repɛ no.
Mfeɛ nson baeɛ no, wɔtua sika a wɔnnim ano kɔgye Europe adehyeɛ. Britain ne AmErica mmaa na wɔtae ku wɔn.
Jihadfoɔ yi agyae French adehyɛ bebree a wɔwɔ Sahel. Wɔgyae wɔn sɛdeɛ wɔn nso yi Jihad atuterafoɔ a wɔwɔ afiase wɔ Mali no.
Mpɛnsɛmpɛnsɛmufoɔ kyerɛ sɛ sika a wɔatua ma Jihadfoɔ a wɔwɔ North ne West Africa a wɔkyekye nkorɔfoɔ bɛboro €100 m ($120m; £90mɔ.
Jihadfoɔ yi de saa sika yi tɔ atuo bebree, atopaeɛ, kaa papa, nhwɛniwa, tetefon na afei nso wɔde fa afoforɔ ma wɔbɛka kuo no ho. Wɔde saa sika yi ara nso mu bi ma aban mu nnipa.
Atowerɛkyɛm a ɛkɔɔ so wɔ nsɔre mu wɔ Burkina Faso no nso bɛyɛ Jihadfoɔ nsa ano adwuma. ɛmfa ho sɛ asraafoɔ pɛ sɛ wɔtu wɔn ase no, Jihadfoɔ yi dwumadie kɔɔ ara na ɛrekɔ soro wɔ borɔno no mu.
ɔman no amannɔe soafoɔ kyerɛ sɛ wɔbɛtu basabasaeɛ yi ase abɛyɛ ɔko a ɛwɔ sɛ wɔko gye Sahel borɔno no nkwa a Burkina Faso, Chad, Mali, Mauritania ne Niger ka ho.
Bosome kakra yi, Jihad asraafoɔ yi ama nnipa 100,000 na adwane afiri wɔn afie mu wɔ Burkina Faso.
Bosome a ɛtwaam no, basabasaeɛ bɛyɛ nnum na akɔ Akristofoɔ so, na wei dodoɔ no ara kɔ so berɛ a wɔreyɛ asɔre. Ekuo biara nkaa sɛ wɔn na wɔdii saa dwuma no nso wɔsusu wɔn a wɔyɛɛ saa no yɛ Jihadfoɔ.
Dɛallil Lounnas a ɛyɛ ɔbenfoɔ wɔ asraafoɔ nsɛm wɔ Al Akhawayn University a ɛwɔ Moroɔɔo kaa sɛ, wei kyerɛ sɛ wɔasesa sɛdeɛ wɔyɛ wɔn nnoɔma mu.
ɔse, Firi mmerɛ a Jihadfoɔ hyɛɛ wɔn basabasaeɛ ase wɔ mpɔtam ha no, mpɛn pii no wɔmfa wɔn asɛm nkɔ ɔsom kumaa no so, nkanka ne Akristofoɔ.
Wei ama Burkina Faso abakɔsɛm sɛ wɔfoaa ɔsom biara so no resɛe na wei yɛ Jihadfoɔ no kwan a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔfa so ma ntawantawa bɛtɔ asom ahodoɔ ntam ne borɔno borɔno ntam.
Louis Audet-Gosselin a ɛwɔ ɔanadian Network for Researɔh Terrorism se, ɛyɛ kwan a atwam a basabasaeɛfoɔ no pɛ sɛ wɔkenyan basabasaeɛ kɛseɛ wɔ ɔman no mu.
Basabasaeɛ ne ntɔkwa nso yɛ akwan a ɛma Jihadfoɔ yi kwa ma wɔnya nkorabata wɔ beaeɛ bi na wɔdi beaeɛ no so.
Owura Audet-Gosselin de too dwa sɛ, Mmammɔsɛm rekɔ fam dabiara wɔ ɔman no mu. Jihad akuo yi regyina brane nkakrankakra a ɛrema aban no ne ɔman no tumi rekɔ fam wɔ nkuraseɛ ne kuropɔn mu.
Wɔn a wɔde wɔn ani asi wɔn so no ne ɔman no wɔ twaka ti sɛ afotufoɔ a wɔwɔ nkuraaseɛ, mɛyɔs, apolisifoɔ, aban nnwumayɛfoɔ ne kuro mma a wɔne asraafoɔ redi dwuma.

Sukuu ne akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ yɛ dɔm ketewa a Jihadfoɔ a wɔmpɛ wiase mu nwomasua yi tumi de wɔn ani si wɔn so. Sukuu ahodoɔ a ɛboro 1,000 a wɔ atifi na wɔahyɛ wɔn ama wɔatom a, ama mmɔfra mmɔfra 150,000 na wɔnkɔ sukuu.
Human Rights Watɔh nso bɔɔ amanneɛ sɛ aban asraafoɔ nso bu nnipa yiedie so berɛ wɔretu atuterafoɔ yi nnwuma ase. ɛbi ne Fulanifoɔ a wɔn mmu dodoɔ no ara Nkramofoɔ a wɔkuu wɔn no.

ActionAid nam ne mfeɛ mmiɛnsa dwumadie a wato ne din Promoting Employment Opportunities for Young people in Ghana (PEOY) a ɔde reboa mmabunu ama wɔanya adwuma mu kwan na ama wɔn anya nimdeɛ ahodoɔ a wɔbɛfa so de ayɛ wɔn abrabɔ ho ntotoeɛ ne wɔn daakye ho dwumadie

Asɛm a KPMG de bɛtoo dwa ne sɛ, Ghana wɔ akwanya pii no ne amenamutu adwuma no mu, ne titiriw sikafuturo. Nokorɛ a ɛwɔ mu ne sɛ, Ghana sikakɔkɔɔ no nko ara yɛ ɔman no GDP no ahamu nkyekyɛmu fa (Ministry of Land and Natural Resources (MLNR), 2003).

Agudietuo abɛyɛ adwuma a nnipa ani aba ho pa ara wɔ baabiara
Akyinegye ahodoɔ a ɛrekɔ so nyinaa fa agudietuo ho, ɛnam boa a ɛboa ɛkonomi no
Mfeɛ du a atwam yi no, Ghana agudietuo no ne titiriw amenamutu nketewa adwuma anim asɛe ɛnam ɔhaw a ɔde rebrɛ ɔman no mpontuo nti

Amenamutu nketewa adwuma a ɛwɔ Ghana no, dodoɔ no ara frɛ no galasey ɛnam agudie tiriw a wɔtu a ɛno ne sikakɔkɔɔ ne dɛnkyɛnbour no. Saa galamsey yi yɛ ɔkwan a nnipa fa so tu agudie a wɔde wɔn ankasa ahoɔden tu na ɛnya nsunsuansoɔ bɔne wɔ wɔn nnipadua so ne asaase no nso so.
Ghana man no mu no, deɛ yɛahu ne sɛ, nnipa bɛyɛ ɔpepem mmiɛnsa na wɔde wɔn ho agye saa adwuma yi mu a emu bɛyɛ 170,000 deɛ wɔyɛ bi wɔnnam mmara kwan so na ɛno nso na wɔyɛ de didie
Saa asɛm galmsey yi yɛ ɔmamfoɔ no ara kasa a wɔfa firii pɔtɔ kasa mu a ɛyɛ gather ne sell a ɛkyerɛ wɔn adwuma a wɔreyɛ no mu
Saa adwuma yi yɛ kwantia a Ghanafoɔ nam so nya sika pa ara ne titiriw ne mmabunu a wɔde wɔn ho ayɛ saa adwuma yi mu no

Saa galamsey yi yɛ ɔkwan baako a ɔmanfoɔ nam so de tu hia firi wɔn ho wɔn ho mu na mmom no ɛyɛ nneɛma mmienu, ɛde ohia ba yɛn apomuden mu, nyarewa, akwanhyia ne nimdeɛ a yɛnni mfa ɔkwan papa a yɛbɛtumi afa so atu saa agudie yi
Nansa yi ara mu no, ɛbɛtɔɔ dwa sɛ nnipa binom ahwere wɔn nkwa ɛnam sɛ amena no buguu wɔn so nti
Wukuada, Obubuo 11, 28, ahwea bu guu nnipa a wɔsusu sɛ wɔbɛyɛ 30 so wɔ Dopoase Wassa Amenfi East mansin a ɛwɔ Atɔe mantam no mu no.

Bio nso no saa, atoyerɛnkyɛm yi bi san sii wɔ Dunkwa-On-Offin so 2010 wɔ Mfinimfini mantam no mu berɛ a amenamutufoɔ binom ahwea bu guu wɔn so wɔ Asuo Offin ho maa emu bɛyɛ 100 wui. Saa nneɛma yi a, ɛsisi no nyɛ adeɛ a yɛde hyɛ obi na mmom no ɔmanfoɔ no ara na ɛsɛ sɛ yɛde soboɔ no bɔ wɔn
Deɛ yɛahunu ne sɛ, wɔyɛ saa adwuma yi wɔ esum ne kwae mu, mfuo, nsuo ano, abepɔ so ne mmeaɛ huhuuhu ne titiri Chinesefoɔ
ɛfiri 2000, Chinesefoɔ bɛyɛ 50,000 na aba ɔman yi mu a, ɔreyɛ amenamudwuma yi a ɛmfa mmara kwan so no bi
Saa atubɛtena yi nyinaa firi sikakɔkɔɔ boɔ a akɔ soro ne nkitahodie a ɛda ɔhina ne Ghana ntam no na ɛde saa galamsey yi nyinaa aba

Kane no agudietuo a na wɔde sofi, pan no asesa kɔ mfidie a wɔde tutu fam a wɔde di dwuma a ɛde ɔhaw kɛseɛ abrɛ ɔman no a ama ɔman mma taatae Chinese amenamutufoɔ no. Adwuma yi de nsunsuansoɔ bɔne abrɛ yɛn ɛnam wiem nsakrae a asesa, nsaase aduanedeɛ resɛe na ɛresɛe nnipa asetena mu nnepa no

Saa suban yi a amanyɔfoɔ, banbɔfoɔ, nhemfo ne akuafoɔ ntumi nsesa no wɔ ɔko a yɛreko atia galamsey no ho no. Banbɔfoɔ ma ahɔhoɔ atuo sɛ wɔmfa mmɔ wɔn ho ban mfiri kurommafoɔ ho ɛnam sɛ sika a wɔbɛnya no wɔma apolisifoɔ yi ne emigirehyinfoɔ yi bi nti

Yɛhu no sɛ, ɔman no amayɔsɛm no nyinaa atete apansam ɛnam sɛ, amanyɔfoɔ no nya mfasoɔ wɔ dwumadie ahodoɔ no so nti no sɛ yɛte kuo biara sɛ kuo no nhwɛ ntoto nneɛma na sɛ kuo no kye obi a, na amanyɔfoɔ yi afa ho abɔ wɔn nterene sɛ wɔbɛma wɔn adwuma abɔ wɔn, ɛnam sɛ wɔmpɛ sɛ wɔn adwuma bɛbɔ wɔn no nti na wɔagyae wɔn na wɔasan nso de mfidie a wɔde tutu fam a wɔkye no nso de ama, a ama yɛntumi nko ntia galamsey no
Nhemfo ne wɔn a nsaase no yɛ wɔn dea no nni tumi biara, sɛ ahɔhoɔ kɔbɔ wura wɔn nsaase so sɛ wɔrekɔtu agudie berɛ a ɔkura tumi krataa fi aban mu a

Sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ na yɛbɛtumi ako saa galamsey yi no, Kɔtɔnimaa, 2013 no manpanindada John Dramani tee asoeɛ asoeɛ agyinatukuo sɛ wɔmmɛyɛ nhyehyɛe mfa nko ntia galamsey adwuma a wɔnam so de Chinesefoɔ 4592 kɔɔ Ayɛwohummɔ bosome no mfinimfini wɔ 2013 no mu. Sɛ yɛhwɛ 2008 Ghana chamber of Minesfoɔ (GCM) nsɛnkae a wɔde bae no a, ɛkyerɛ sɛ, amenamutu adwuma a ɛmfa mmara kwan so no akɔ soro afiri 300,000 abɛduru 500,000 a wɔn a wɔde mfidie nketewa yɛ no na wɔdɔɔso pa ara na wɔmfa mmara a wɔhyɛɛ no 1989 no nyɛ adwuma na wɔde agudie ne famtu mmara Act, 2006 (Acts 703) a ɛkyerɛ sɛ agudie no yɛ ɔman no deɛ na ɛkyerɛ ɔkwan a ɛsɛ sɛ obi fa so de gye tumi krataa ansa na wɔatumi akɔyɛ adwuma no bi.

Ghana Rubber Estate Limited, (GREL) twaa agyaadwoɔ nnawɔtwe a ɛtwaa mu no faa adwuma a ɛtia mmara a wɔde amanyɔsɛm afra mu de resɛe nsaase no.
Adwumakuo no kyerɛ sɛ, deɛ ɛrekɔ so no bɛsɛe wɔn adwuma a wɔde sika bɛyɛ £550,000 ahyɛ mu.
Wɔn a wɔde ɔbɔadeɛ nneɛma yɛ rubba a ɛfiri 2018 wɔreboa mansin baako mfidi dwuma baako dwumaddie no ahyɛ ase retrɛ wɔn dwumadie a afe biara no 25,000 tonso na wɔde ba dwaman so.
Saa ahoɔdenfa a nkuro binom pɛ sɛ wɔfa GREl nsaase de yɛ galamsey no nnam mmara kwan so ɛnam saa nti no ɛsɛ sɛ wɔkasa tia na wɔn a wɔreyɛ saa no nyinaa yɛkye wɔn

Saa GREL nsaase a wɔbɛte asim no nnam mmara kwan so. Eyi bɛkɔ atia nneɛma a ɛhia adwumayɛkuo mmienu yi na asan nso asɛe mmoa a GREL renya fi mansin baako- mfidi dwuma baako nhyehyɛe no mu no a ɛfa rɔba adwuma a wɔresi no foforɔ no ho, dwumakuo no kaa yie wɔ asɛnka mu.

Nanso, berɛ a adwumakuo no, ɔorporate Affairs Manager, Perry Aɔheampong ɔkyerɛɛ sɛ, galamseyfoɔ nsɛm a wɔreka sɛ wɔwɔ akwanya sɛ wɔdi saa dwuma no wɔ kuro no mu berɛ a Operation Vanguard  antumi amma wɔn dwumadie amma awieɛ: wɔkaeɛ sɛ wɔnnyaa akwan biara sɛ wɔdi saa dwuma no.
Ghana Rubber Estate Limited (GRELɔ wɔ mfeɛ 50 a wɔde ama wɔn sɛ wɔnni dwuma na wɔmfaa wɔn asaase no mu fa bi mpo mmaa obiara sɛ wɔmfa ntu agudie.
sɛ, yɛbɔɔ Mansin no amanneɛ faa galamsefoɔ adwuma no biribi kakra a wɔde rma yɛn no. Na Mansin no ka kyerɛɛ yɛn sɛ, wɔbɛyɛ nhwehwɛmu afa ho

Sɛ aban no yɛ sɛ, sɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔnya biribi kakra firi deɛ adwuma yi de ma yɛn no mu a, yɛayɛ krado sɛ yɛne no bɛtena ase aka, nanso nea ɛte ne sɛ, deɛ wɔreyɛ no ɛnnam mmara kwan so esiane sɛ yɛmfaa biribiara mmaa wɔn yɛ.

ɔfa a ɛnnam mmara kwan so a ɔde afa GREL nsaase a ɛwɔ nkurow binom so nyinaa de reyɛ galamsey adwuma no nyɛ papa a ɛsɛ sɛ yɛkasa tia na wɔn nso a wɔhwɛ yɛɛ saa anaa wɔdi wɔn anim no nyinaa no yɛkye wɔn.
Saa ɔfa yi a, galamseyfoɔ afa GREL nsaase yi de nsunsuanso bɔne bɛbrɛ adwumakuo no, ne titiriw ne asaase mu nneɛma ahorow a saa nnwumakuo mmienu yi de yɛ adwuma.
ɛbɛsan nso asɛe mmoa a GREL renya firi One District One FActory nhyehyɛe no mu a, ɛreboa ama wɔatumi asi ne raba purosɛsene adwuma no.
ɛsan nso de nsunsuanso bɛbrɛ Ghana Rubber Estate Limited ɛnam sɛ nsaase na ɛyɛ akadeɛ kɛseɛ a wɔde adwuma no nti sɛ asaase nni hɔ a wɔde bɛdua ne nnɔbae no. Na ɛba saa nso a GREL entumi nyɛ n’adwuma.
Saa wɔannyae adwuma yi a, ɛbɛsɛe GREL Estate Division 3 nsaase a ɛyɛ eka 350 a ɛbɛn Adeiwoso a ɛwɔ Apimenim-Elubo kwan no so no. Wɔdua raba wɔ saa beaeɛ no wɔ afe apem ahankron ne aduosia no mu.
Sika a GREL de ahyɛ saa adwuma yi mu firi 2010 de bɛsi nnɛ bɛyɛ £550,000 a ne nyinaa bɛtumi ahye saa wɔnnyae wɔn adwuma no a.
GREL nso bɛtumi ahwere Ghana sika botene a ɛyɛ ɔpepem mmiɛnsa ne akyiri pɔ num wɔ mfeɛ aduosa a edi yɛn anim yi mu, sɛ wɔsɛe saa beaɛ no a.

Sidney Casely-Hayford a ɔkasa fa nneɛma ahorow a ɛsisi no ho sɛ, akyerɛ adwene sɛ, aban no nsusui sɛ ɔde duroneso na ɛbɛko galamsey adwuma no abere a wɔyɛ nsesam wɔ Operation Vanguard nhyehyɛe no ho no yɛ mmerɛ sɛe kwa.
Mr. Casely-Hayford kyerɛɛ sɛ, saa adwene no yɛ adwene a ɛntumi nnyina na ɛmfa mfaso papa biara mma na saa adwene no adi kan mpo awu ansa na ɛrebɛhyɛ aseɛ.
Wei yɛ mmerɛ sɛe ara kwa, ɛntumi ɛnsi yɛn haw ano kwan
Saa nsusui yi yɛ deɛ ɛrekyerɛ sɛ, ɛfiri ɔbenem bosome a ɛwɔ 2020 mu reba no, aban no bɛyi asraafoɔ a ɔreko tia galamsey no nyinaa afiri mmeammea ahorow no nyinaa.

Sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ na aban no ani bɛkɔ so adi saa adwuma yi a ɛmfa mmara kwan so no akyi nti, Citi News kyerɛɛ sɛ aban no de n’ani bɛto nnipa a wɔbɔ ban wɔn mmeaɛ ahodoɔ a wɔtu fam agudeɛ no ne nnipa Chaduanannan a wɔtumi ka durone a wɔfiri Nation Builders ɔorps no mu no so.
Nanso Mr Casely-Hayford kyerɛɛ sɛ, saa adwene wɔnnwene yie pa ara.
ɔkaa sɛ, megye di sɛ, yɛntenaa ase ɛnhyɛɛ da nnwenee ɔkwan a yɛbɛfa so asi saa galamsey adwuma yi ano.
ɔtoaa so sɛ, adwene biara a aban no de bɛba no, ɛsɛ sɛ ɛyɛ deɛ ɛbɛboa ama nsuwa ahodoɔ no ani atete.
Aso sɛnea mopɛ sɛ moyɛ no no, momfa nhyehyɛe bi nto ho.
Sɛ wotu asaase no mu na sɛ wonnya sika biara a, anaa mpo wonnya sika mpo a asan yɛ asaase no sɛnea na ɛte deda no ara.

Nhwehwɛmu a akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ bi a wɔwɔ PoliticalSɔienɔe Department a ɛwɔ University of Ghana kyerɛɛ sɛ, ɔko a aban no reko tia galamsey adwuma no yɛ nhyehyɛe a ɛtɔso mmienu a ɔmanfoɔ pii no ara nnye ntom koraa.
ɛnam saa nhyehyɛe yi nti no, aban no kraa durone ahanu sɛ ɔde bɛko galamsey wɔ ɔman no afaanan nyinaa.
Wɔde durones yi twa mfoni wɔ mansin ahodoɔ a wɔyɛ saa nnwuma yi pa ara.
ɛnam durones yi so maa wɔde nnipa binom kɔɔ George Grant University of Mines and Teɔhnology a ɛwɔ Tarkwa wɔ atɔe mantam no mu kɔkyerɛɛ wɔn sɛnea yɛtwi no.
Nnipa binom nso kyerɛ sɛ asraafoɔ a wɔyii wɔn firii hɔ de durones no bae no yɛ adeɛ a ɛmmoa mma yɛntumi nni saa nsusui yi botae ho.

Asraafoɔ a wontumi nhwɛ mma yɛntu fam agudeɛ tuo a ɛnnam mmara kwan so no hyɛɛ aseɛ 1990 no mu. Berɛ a edi kan asraafoɔ kɔɔ ɔman no afaanan nyinaa hwɛɛ sɛ wɔretu galamsey adwuma no ase berɛ a na wɔagye PNDCL 218, 1989 a fam agudie tuo ho no.
Asraafoɔ dwumadie no mu baako san baa so wɔ Obubuo, 2006 no mu na nea epue mu ne sɛ, saa dwumadie no kɔ tia nnipa fahodie.
Afe 2013 no mu no, aban no yɛɛ ntweaso nhyehyɛe bi a na ɛhyɛ asoeɛ asoeɛ mmarahyɛ-nnisoɔkuo a asraafoɔ nko ara na wɔwom nsa.
The Alliancefor SocialEquity and Public Accountability(ASEPAɔ ho dwirii wɔn sɛ aban kwantenkoro mmaranimni antumi anhwɛ anko antia kataasehyɛ ne porɔeɛɛ ahorow a na ɛrekɔ so wɔ galamsey ko no mu.

ASEPA kyerɛw krataa kɔmaa aban kwantenkoro mmaranimni no ɔffese no sɛ, anka ɔnhwɛ na ɔmma mmara ahodoɔ a ɛbɔ fam agudie tuo adwuma no ho ban no nyinaa nyɛ adwuma berɛ a ɔne asoeɛ-asoeɛ-mmarahyɛ-nnisoɔkuo ɔhwɛ fam agudie tuo soɔ no reka abom ɛnam mfidie a wɔde tutu fam a ɛboro ɔha a ɛyerae Operation Vanguardfoɔ gyee no nyinaa.
Nanso ɔfesse no san kyerɛɛ brɛɛ wɔn sɛ, nsɛm ahodoɔ a wɔka wɔ mu no nkyerɛ sɛ, kataahyesɛ ne porɔeɛɛ bi akɔ so wɔ baabi.

Berɛ a Owura Mensah Thomson a ɔno na ɔda ASEPA ano no reka biribi afa nea obi de n’ani hui no ho no, ɔkyerɛɛ sɛ, ɔde aban-kwantenkoro-mmaranimni no bɛkɔ asɛnnibea na ama asɛnnibea no ahyɛ no ama wɔayɛ nea ɛfata atumi ahwehwɛ nsɛm no mu.
Madi aban-kwantenkoro-mmaranimni no ɔfesse no ho yaw pa ara
Saa anoyie yi de wantwitwi bi baa sɛnea aban-kwantenkoro-mmaranimni no nso bua asɛm no.
Anammɔm a yɛbɛtu bio ne sɛ, yɛde asɛm no bɛkɔ asɛnnibea
Yɛbɛyɛ nhyiamu bi ahwɛ nsɛm ahorow a yɛbɛka ho asɛm wɔ asɛnnibea hɔ.
Yɛpɛ sɛ yɛma Ghanafoɔ nyinaa hu sɛ, saa asɛm yi nsii, ɛfiri sɛ yɛpɛ sɛ yɛhu biribiara a ɛfa asɛm no ho.
Yɛbɛhwɛ nnɛema ahodoɔ a ɛwɔ yɛn atenae mu ne wiase nkabomkuo a wɔhwɛ bɔ yɛn kwae ne mmɔnten ho ban ne wiase nkabomkuo ahodoɔ a wɔbɔ nsaase ne yɛn mpɔtam ho ban.
Mr. Thomson kaa sɛ, saa nsɛm yi yɛ nneɛma a ehia pa ara a enni kwan sɛ yɛdi ho agorɔ koraa.
Krataa a epue abɔntene a na Martin Amidu nsa hyɛ aseɛ kyerɛɛ sɛ, Apolisifoɔ nkrobata a wɔyɛ nhwehwɛmu (CID) no ahyɛ aseɛ reyɛ nhwehwɛmu afa saa nsɛmsɛm yi nyinaa ho.
Na ɔtwerɛɛ wɔ krataa no mu sɛ ɔID no wɔ akadeɛ mapa sɛ wɔbɛtumi ayɛ nhwehwɛmu no.

Martin Amidu ka kaa ho sɛ, yɛhwehwɛɛ wo krataa no mu no, nea yɛhuu ne sɛ nsɛm ahodoɔ a wɔde too dwa no nyɛ adeɛ a ɛkyerɛ kataasehyɛ ne porɔeɛɛ biara a sɛhyn 79 (section 79 of office of the Special Prosecutor Act, 2017 (Act959C)  ka ho asɛm anaasɛ ɛmma aban kwantenekora mmaranimni no ho kwan sɛ ɔhwehwɛ mu.

ASEPA aka sɛ kwadu a ɛfa kataasehyɛ ne porɔeɛɛ ho no nyinaa yɛ deɛ ɛrekɔ so wɔ galamsey ko a ɔman no reko tia no na aboa ama wɔn a wɔreyɛ saa nnwuma ahorow no nyinaa anya krataa mapa a edi adanseɛ sɛ ampa yɛama wɔn ho kwan sɛ wɔnnye adwuma no na aboa ama aban no nso atumi any biribi afi mu.

ASEPA san de too dwa sɛ, wɔn kwadu no nyinaa fa nneyɛe bɔne bi te sɛ korɔno, kataasehyɛ, porɔeɛɛ, na ɔman no nneɛma binom a nnipa bi de yɛ wɔn ankasa adwuma nya mfasoɔ gu wɔn ankasa bɔtɔ mu a aban kwantenekora mmaranimni no te hɔ hwɛ no hann.
Seesei ara no, wɔakye nnipa baasia a wɔsusu sɛ, wɔnim biribi fa mfidie a wɔde tutu fam a ayera no ho.

Saa nnipa nsia yi, emu baako ne NPP amanyɔkuo no mfinimfini mantam titinani abediakyire a ɔdi kan no, Ekow Ewusi a ɔtee ne kasa wɔ rekɔɔdine bi fa nkɔmmɔtwetwe a ɛkɔɔ so wɔ ɔne ɔsoafoɔ a ɔhwɛ nsaase, abɔdeɛ mu nyansapɛ ne mfidie so, Professor Kwabena Frimpong-Boateng fa nneɛma binom a ɛsɛ sɛ wɔde ma wɔn a wɔwɔ mmeae a wɔtumi agudeɛ no.

ɔsoafoɔ a ɔhwɛ nsaase, abɔdeɛ mu nyansapɛ, mfidie ne mpontu so, Professor Kwabena Frimpong-Boateng anye kwadu ahodoɔ a yɛde abɔ ne ba, ɛoɛo Frimpong-Boateng no atom sɛ wakɔtu agudie wɔ Ghana kwae a yɛrebɔ ho ban no mu.
ɔkyerɛɛ sɛ, saa kwadu no nyinaa yɛ ntorɔ.
Prof. Frimpong-Boateng de gye a wɔnnye antom yi too dwa berɛ a ɔne sɛntwerɛni bi dii nkɔmmɔ Yawoadano berɛ a na ɔmanpanin de nsɛm ahodoɔ a ɛfa ɔman no gyinabea ho nyinaa akɔto dwa awie.
Prof. Frimpong-Boateng ka kyerɛɛ nsɛnkyerɛfoɔ sɛ, ne ba no mfaa ne ho nnyee hwee mu na wiase no bɛhu ne nyinaa mmere tiawa bi mu.
Nsɛnsɛm bi baa sɛ adwumakuo bi a Prof. Frimpong-Boaten ba, ɛoɛo Frimpong Boateng ne wɔn di nkitaho de wɔn ho ahyɛ fam agudie tuo mu a ɛnnam mmara kwan so.
Wɔn a wɔagye asɛm yi agyina mu ne National Democratic Congress (NDCɔ amanyɔkuo a enni aban mu ne Assin Centralmmarahyɛbedawni, Kennedy Agyapong.
Kennedy Agyapong kyerɛ sɛ, mfidie a wɔde tutu fam bi a aban np gyee yɛ no, wɔnam Ekow Ewusi a saa berɛ yi ɔwɔ apolisifoɔ nsam so no na wɔde maa ɛoɛo Frimpong-Boateng.
Berɛ a Kennedy Agyapong rekasa wɔ Net2 TV no, ɔkaa sɛ, adɛn na ɛyɛ sɛ wogye nkurɔfoɔ mfidie a wɔde tutu fam na wode kɔ ma wo ba ma no de yɛ n’adwuma.
ɔsoafoɔ no nso annye saa kwadu no mu biara antom.
Biribi biara a mayɛ wɔ wiase mu ha yi, meyɛɛ maa Ghanafoɔ.
Menyɛɛ biribiara mmaa me ho. Hwɛ me, memfaa me ho nnyee kataasehyɛ biara mu da.
ɔde too dwa sɛ, menyee sika mfii obiara hɔ da. Menyee anyamera sɛm biara da.
ɔfrɛ pii no ara na wanya sɛ anka ɔmfa n’adwuma nto hɔ, ɛnam mfidie a wɔde tutu fam bɛyɛ ɔha a ayera no nti.
Adam Mutawakilu a ɔka abedwakuo a ɛwɔ mmarahyɛbadwamu a ɔhwɛ agudietuo ne anyinam so no mpo hyɛɛ sɛ anka ɔnkye no.
Nanso ɔsoafo yi gyinaa ne nan so, berɛ a na wɔrebisabisa ho nsɛm na ɔman no pɛ sɛ ohu biribiara a ɛwɔ asɛm no mu.
mfidie a wɔde tutu fam ahorow a ayera no nyina no wɔbɛhu.
ɔsoafoɔ a ɔhwɛ nsaase, abɔdeɛ mu nyansapɛ, mfidie ne mpontu so, Professor Kwabena Frimpong-Boateng de too dwa.
ɔsoafo no kyerɛɛ sɛ, ɔman no banbɔkuo no gu so reyɛ nhwehwɛmu afa nsɛm no ho na nea ɛwɔ mu biara no bɛdan adi.

ɔsoafoɔ yi a nnipa pii no ara ato wɔn ano agu ne so yi ɛnam sɛ ontumi nkyerɛ nneɛma a ɔgyegye firii wɔn a wɔnnam kwan pa so retu fam agudie afa nti no, ɔde gye die ne ɔpɛ pa kaa sɛ nneɛma no a, ayera no wɔbɛhunu.
ɔka kyerɛɛ sɛnkyerɛfoɔ sɛ, exkaveita biara a ayera no wɔbɛhu.
Mempɛ sɛ metietia adwuma a banbɔkuo no reyɛ no mu, ɛno nti monya aboterɛ, nokware no bɛpue nansa yi ara.
ɛbɛdaa adi sɛ, mfidie a wɔde tutu fam bi a, Operation Vanguardfoɔ gye firii galamseyfoɔ ne amenamu dwumayɛfoɔ binom a wɔanni aban nhyehyɛe no so no ayera.
ɛbɛdan adi sɛ, nnipa titire binom a wɔwɔ amanyɔkuo a ɔte so yi so New PatrioticParty (NPPɔ mufo bi yɛ saa adwuma yi bi na wɔn na wɔasesa mfidie a wɔde tutu fam yi de kɔ
Amanyɔkuo a onni aban mu no National Democratic Congress (NDCɔ nso kyerɛ sɛ aban no de ɔhyɛ too adwuma no so sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ne nkurɔfoɔ bɛtumi afa aseɛ akɔyɛ na wapam wɔn a wɔn ka ne ho.
ɛoɛo Frimpong-Boateng, ɔsoafo yi ba yi ka wɔn a wɔyɛ galamsey adwuma yi bi no ho na wɔasan asesa mfidie a wɔde tutu fam a aban no gyee no de akɔ Ghana kwae a ɔrebɔ ho ban no mu de kɔyɛ adwuma.
Nanso ɔsoafoɔ no kaa sɛ, ɛnyɛ nokware.
ɔsoafoɔ no kaa sɛ, ɛoɛo Frimpong-Boateng nka hwee ho na ɛnkye wiase no bɛhu ne nyinaa.

Nso no NPP amanyɔkuo no titiritenani abediakyire a ɔdi a ɔwɔ mfinimfini mantam mu no Horaɔe Ekow Ewusi a ɔno na asɛm yi nyinaa gyina ne so na ɔsan huu no wɔ nseni bi mu no kyerɛ sɛ ɔne NPP amanyɔkuo no twerɛtwerɛfoɔ, Boadu na ɔsoafoɔ no hyɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔmfa mfidie a wɔde tutu fam a wɔgye no nyɛ adwuma.
Mr. Ewusi kyerɛɛ sɛ, sika a wɔbɛnya afiri saa adwuma yi mu no bɛtumi aboa ama wɔatoto amanyɔkuo no adwuma yie.
John Boadu annye saa nsɛm yi anto mu.
Prof. Kwabena Frimpong-Boateng ahyɛ ɔriminal Investigations Department a ɔwɔ  Ghana Police Service mu no sɛ wɔnhwehwɛ nsɛm ahodoɔ a Mr. Ekow reka no mu
Deɛ ɔhyɛɛ Ekow Ewusi sɛ ɔnyɛ ne sɛ, ɔmfa mfidie a wɔde tutu fam no ne nneɛma bi a aban no nam Operation Vanguard so agye no nsie yie
Seesei ara no deɛ, nnipa nsia a wɔkyee wɔn faa mfidie a wɔde tutu fam a ayera no ho no wɔama wɔn baili.
ɔmanpanin Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo ahyɛ ne bɔhyɛ a ɔde reko atia galamsey so sa no mu kena wɔ ɔman yi mu.
ɔmapaninAkufo Addo de ɔman no ho nsɛm reto gua no, ɔkyerɛɛ sɛ, ɔbɛkɔ so ayɛ deɛ ɔbɛtumi biara de abɔ yɛn nsaase ho ban afiri galamseyfoɔ a wɔgu so resɛe yɛn nsaase ne yɛn mfudeɛ ahodoɔ no nyinaa.
ɔkaa eyi, ɛnam bɔhyɛ a ɔhyɛe berɛ a ɔrebɔ ntoa wɔ afe 2016 sɛ wɔnto aba mma no no na sɛ ɔba a, deɛ aban dadaa no antumi anyɛ amfa ansi Galamsey kwan no ɔbɛba abɛyɛ

Berɛ a na ɔrebɔ nsɛntwerɛfoɔ adwuma no aba so wɔ de a wɔde wɔn ho agye ɔko a ɔman no reko atia galamsey no, Nana Addo kaa sɛ, obibiara nni hɔ a ɔbɛyi no tokyene sɛ ɔbɛboa ama yɛatu galamsey so sa na atumi abɔ Ghana nsaase ho ban.
Berɛ a yɛbaa aban mu ɔpɛpɔn, 2017 no, na galamsey adwuma no agye nsam wɔ ɔman no mmeaɛ pii no ara. Yɛn nsaase, yɛn kwae ne nsubontene ahodoɔ nyinaa no na asɛesɛe yɛmpɛɛ ɔkwan papa biara mfa mfaa so.
Amanyɔkuo a, wotwaa mu no abam buu wɔ ho, nanso yɛn deɛ yɛhu ne sɛ saa adeɛ yi nyɛ adeɛ a ɛsɛ sɛ yɛsoso so koraa, ɛnam sɛ nkyire mma bɛbua yɛnfɔ. ɛno nti no ɛsɛ sɛ yɛ nsaase no ho ban ma wɔn.
ɛnam saa nti no, menni ɔhyɛ biara ase a ɛmma yɛntumi nko ntia saa adeɛ.

M’ani gye saa nkuranhyɛ a ɔmanfoɔ de ma me no ho, na wɔn ara ahu ɔsɛe a saa dwumadie bɛtumi asɛe yɛn nsaase, yɛn suwa ani, ne awuwua wuwuo a yɛn mmabunu no rewu wɔ mmene ahodoɔ a wɔtuo no ho. Mmarahyɛbadwamu kyeame, saa galamsey adwuma yi de ɔhaw kɛseɛ bɛbrɛ daakye nkyiri mma.
Yɛntumi ntena ase na yɛnyɛ nhwɛ hann na yɛnnyae galamsey ko yi. Aban no nnyaegyae ne ho mu na agye nsɛntwerɛfoɔ ntaakyire a wɔde taa no akyi no atom mu.
Asoeɛ asoeɛ agyinatukuo a ɔrehwɛ amenamu dwuma a ɛmfa mmara kwan so no gu so reyɛ adwuma den na nkonimdie bi wɔ hɔ.
Deɛ amanyɔkuo a ɔwɔ aban mu New PatrioticParty (NPP) reka ne sɛ saa ɔko yi a yɛreko atia amenamu dwuma a ɛmfa kwan mu yi a yɛfrɛ no galamsey no, ɛnni kwan sɛ yɛde frafra amanyɔsɛm koraa.
Deɛ amanyɔkuo no ka ne sɛ, ɔhaw a ɛde ba no ka obibiara ɛnam saa nti no ɛsɛ sɛ yɛn nyinaa na yɛsom na yɛatumi ako atia dwumadie no.
Saa nsusui yɛ baa ɛnam nsɛm binom a National Democratic Congress (NDCɔ amanyɔkuo no rekeka sɛ aban no ahwe ase wɔ ɔko a ɔreko tia galamsey a ɛredi ɔman no nya no ho.
Onipa a ɔda Nkitahodie ano ma NPP amanyɔkuo no Yaw Buaben Asamoa de too dwa sɛ, obiara mfa ne ho nnye ɔko a yɛreko tia galamsey no
Yɛn nyinaa yɛnim nsɛnsɛm ahodoɔ a aba mfidie a wɔde tutu fam a ayera no ho a asɛ deɛ galamsey ko no reyɛ atɔ nsuo mu no.
Anigyesɛm ne sɛ, yɛde asɛm no ama apolisifoɔ
Yɛpɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔhwɛ ma yɛdi mmara so no yɛ ho nhwehwɛmu.
Anka deɛ yɛbɛpɛ ne sɛ, NDCfoɔ mpaninfoɔ ne yɛn bɛka abom na ama yɛako saa ɔko yi sene sɛ, wɔde bɛyɛ amanyɔsɛm a ɛtete yɛn mu.
Yɛgye di sɛ anka wei bɛyɛ adeɛ a ɛfa amanyɔkuo mmienu no ho a yɛbɛtumi abom asi ano kwan yiye.
Deɛ NDCfoɔ hu no ne sɛ, wɔakye mu mmiɛnsa, ɔrebɔ ɔmanpaninkwaadu, na wɔreteateam sɛ nsiano no nyɛ adwuma na womaa yɛtoo aba maa wo a, wonntumi mfa nsesa biara mma.
Nnawɔtwe a atwan yi, NDCfoɔ akyerɛ sɛ, aban no ko a ɔreko atia galamsey no anyɛ adwuma ɛnam wɔn a aban no apaw wɔn sɛ wɔnyɛ adwuma mma no ne nneɛma binom a ayera.
Nanso deɛ ɛteɛ ne sɛ, NPP atwe ne ho afiri obibiara a ɔreyɛ biribi atia ɔko a wɔreko galamsey no.
Deɛ ɛte ne sɛ, kuo ahodoɔ binom ahyɛ aban no sɛ, wɔmma wɔn hu baabi a galamsey ko no akɔ akɔdu, na NDCfoɔ nso kyerɛ sɛ aban no mfa mfidie a wɔde tutu fam dodoɔ a wagye no nyinaa mɛto dwa.
Nkɔmmɔdie bebree na akɔ so afa ɔko a ɔman no reko atia galamsey no ho wɔ bosome ahodoɔ a atwam yi mu.
Wei nyinaa gyina , ɔkwan a ɔman no pɛ sɛ ɔfa so tu ɔhaw yi a ɛwɔ mu no fi hɔ.
Nanso nnawɔtwe yi a edidi soɔ yi deɛ, ɛrekame ayɛ sɛ ɔko a yɛreko atia amenamu dwuma a ɛnnam mmara kwan so no reyɛ ayera.

ɛnam deɛ yɛaka wɔ soro no nti no, ɛsɛ sɛ yɛhwɛ ɔkwan ahodoɔ a yɛfaa so sɛ yɛde reko atia galamsey no hyɛɛ aseɛ, baabi a akɔ akodu, ne deɛ atumi afiri mu aba, sɛdeɛ ɛhyɛɛ aseɛ, na mfehyia mmiɛnsa a atwam yi no sɛn na abɛdu.
Eyi ho hia ɛfiri sɛ ɛbɛma yɛatoto nneɛma yie.
ɛho hia pa ara ɛfiri sɛ, ɛyɛ ɔmanpanin adwuma.
Afe 2016, Citi FM gye ɔko a yɛreko atia galamsey no gyinaa mu.
Saa  berɛ no na nsubontene akɛseɛ ahodoɔ a ɛwɔ Atɔe, Asante ne Apue mantam a nnipa bɛyɛ ɔpepem du sa nsuo firi mu nom no nyinaa aseɛ.
Ankobra, Offin ne Birim ne saa nsubontene yi.
Ghana adwuma a ɔhwɛ nsuo so no bɔɔ wɔn kɔkɔ wɔ nsunsuansoɔ ahodoɔ a ɛde bɛba saa berɛ no.
Adwumakuo a ɔhwɛ nsuo aniteɛ ne ne kyekyɛ soɔ no kaa sɛ, sɛ temanmufoɔ ahwɛ ansi saa adeɛ yi ano kwan a, atoyerɛnkyɛm pa ara na ɛbɛto ɔman yi daaky.

Wɔbɔɔ wɔn kɔkɔ sɛ anhwɛ a Ghana bɛkra nsuo wɔ afe aduonu a edi yɛn anim reba yi mu sɛ yɛnhwɛ ansi saa ɔhaw yi ano a. ɛnam atekyɛ a ɛnne nsuo no adi afra nti, mfidie ahodoɔ a wɔde yɛ adwuma no, wɔde yɛ adwuma no ma no boro sɛnea ɛsɛ sɛ ɛyɛ adwuma no so sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a nsuo no no mu bɛte na ani atumi adahɔ ama nnipa atumi de adi dwuma wɔ wɔn afie fie mu.
Eyi de nkɔmmɔ twetwe bebree aba a ɔman no mu a, ɛsɛ sɛ aba no hwɛ na ɔde nneɛma bi gu apono so de si ano kwan.
Aban no de nhyɛ too amenamu dwuma biara so wɔ Ayɛwohumɔmmɔ, 2017.

ɔtee asoeɛ asoeɛ agyinatukuo a ɔbɛhwɛ asi amenamu dwuma a, ɛnam mmara kwan so no ano. Nnipa a na wɔwɔ agyinatukuo yi mu yɛ du na wɔn ne ɔsoafoɔ a ɔhwɛ nsaase ne fam agudeɛ soɔ, banbɔ soafoɔ, Nkurase nkurase amammuo ne ne mpontuo soafoɔ, Mantam ntotoeyɛ soafoɔ, ahensɛm ne ɔsom mu nsɛm soafoɔ, nsesee soafoɔ, dawubɔ soafoɔ, ahonidie ne nsuwansuwa soafoɔ, nsaase ne abɔdeɛ mu nyansapɛ ne mfidie ne nnannemu soafoɔ a ɔno na wɔyɛ wɔn titenani.
Agyinatukuo yi paw asraafoɔ ne apolisifoɔ a wɔaka abom a wɔfrɛ wɔn Operation Vanguard no ho ntoma na mmeaɛ ahodoɔ a wɔbɛdi wɔn dwuma no yɛ Asante, Apue, Atɔe ne Mfinimfini mantam no mu.
Wɔn dwumadie ne sɛ, wɔnkɔpam wɔn a wɔreyɛ amenamu dwuma a ɛnnam mmara kwan so no nyinaa na ɔnsan hwɛ sɛ wɔmma obiara kwan nkɔyɛ amenamu dwuma ɛnam ɔhyɛ a ɔde ato so no nti.
Agyinatukuo no adwuma ne sɛ, wɔnhwɛ na ɔntene tene Operation Vanguardfoɔ no na wɔmma amenamu nwuma nketewa no krataa a ɛkyerɛ sɛ wɔbɛtumi ayɛ adwuma
Afe baako akyi no, a ɛyɛ 2018 no, ɔtotoo amenamu nnwumakuo no bi ano na ɔmaa bɛyɛ ɔhasia krataa edi adanseɛ sɛ wɔtumi san kɔyɛ wɔn adwuma no.

2017 no mu no, atemmuafoɔ paninhyɛɛ asɛnnibea nson sɛ, wonni amenamu dwumafoɔ asɛm wɔ hɔ. Saa asɛnnibea ahorow yi ne nea ɛwɔ Accra, Sekondi, Kumase, ɔape ɔoast, Koforidua, Sunyani ne Bolgatanga berɛ a wɔde Minerals ne Mining Act, (Act703ɔ no redi dwuma. Mmarahyɛbadwa no nso sesaa Minerals ne Mining Act, (Act703) no mu kakra de asotwe a emu yɛ den bɛhyehyɛɛ mu
ɔhyɛɛ ɔman no nnwuma bi te sɛ Forestry Commission ne ngudeɛ asoeɛ sɛ wɔnhyɛ wɔn mmara no mu kena na ɛntumi mmoa nko ntia amenamu dwuma ahorow no.
Agyinatukuo no nso pɛɛ akadeɛ bi te sɛ galamstop, appo bi a ɛbɛboa ma agyinatukuo no reyɛ de ako atia galamsey no.
Wɔgoo ɔhyɛ a na ɛda amenamu dwuma nketewa no so mu ɔpɛnimaa, 2018 no aberɛ a wɔhyɛ wɔn so ama afe atwa.
Kuo no ne amenamutufoɔ bɛyɛ ɔhansia di nkɔmmɔ na wɔmaa wɔn tumi krataa sɛ wɔnkɔyɛ wɔn adwuma.
Berɛ a na nkɔmmɔ die no ahye aseɛ bosome pɛpɛɛpɛ wɔ Obubuo, 2018 no mu
Ma me mfa wo mfa nneɛma binom a yɛde saa amenamutufoɔ yi faa mu ansa na rema wɔn krataa sɛ wɔnkɔyɛ wɔn adwuma.
Wɔn a na wɔn nkrataa yɛ ansa na aban de ɔhyɛ bɛto so Oforisuo 1, 2017 no, wɔmfa wɔn nkrataa nyinaa mmra agyinatukuo no anim ansa na fiada a ɛyɛ ɛbɔ 7, 2018.

Krataa ahorow a na wɔrehwɛ animsɛ wɔde bɛba yɛ amenamutuo adansedie krataa, asaase no so krataa, adwuma no ho krataa, krataa a ɛkyerɛ sɛ wɔatwerɛ dwuma a ɔredi no din, wo toɔ namba, wo pasepɔto mfoni mmienu, w’awoda krataa, passpɔrto anaa abatoɔ krataa no ɛnna adeɛ a ɛkyerɛ w’akyi kwan.
Amenamu dwumafoɔ a na wɔn nkrataa ho nni asɛm no wɔsan maa wɔnkɔtoa wɔn adwuma so.
Agyinatukuon san yii kuo foforo a na wɔfrɛ wɔn GalamStop ɛbɔ 29, 2019 sɛ wɔmmɛboa Operation Vanguard adwuma no.
Nkurɔfoɔ too wɔn ano guu asraafoɔ ne apolisifoɔ kuo a ɛbaa akyiri no so ɛnam saa wɔanhyɛ da akyerɛ wɔn dwumadie ase.
ɔtwerɛtwerɛni a na ɔda saa kuo yi ano kraa durones sɛ ɛmmra na wɔmfa nhwehwɛ wɔn a wɔregu so yɛ amenamutu adwuma no a ɛnam mmara kwan so ne titiriw ne wɔn a wɔwɔ kwae no mu.

Me nhwehwɛmu a meyɛɛ firii agyinatukuo no hɔ no kyerɛ me sɛ 144 durones atwifoɔ na wɔtetee wɔn firii Nation’s Builders ɔorps no mu. ɔkyerɛ sɛ, emu du na na wɔkɔkaa agyinatukuo no ho, du-nwɔtwe kɔkaa Operation Vanguard ho, ɛnna 15 kɔkaa ngudeɛ asoeɛ.
ɛsan nso gyee suhyɛn a eguane pa ara sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ɛbɛboa Operation Vanguardfoɔ no ama wɔatumi ayɛ wɔn nnwuma no bi wɔ nsuo ano.
ɛbɛsi 2019 no mu no, na Operation Vanguardfoɔ akye amenamutufoɔ yi bɛyɛ 2,000 a emu bi yɛ Chinesefoɔ ɛnna dodoɔ no ara yɛ Ghanafoɔ
ɛnam nnyegyina mu ahodoɔ nti no, nteyɛe bae sɛ nsuo no resi ne dada mu
Aban no nso de nkurowtoa amenamutuo adwuma baa 2019 no sɛnea ɛbɛboa kurow mma a wɔn ani gye amenamutuo adwuma no ho no.
ɔhwɛ nea woatumi ayɛ afa amenamutuo adwuma a ɛmfa mmara kwan so no a, otitenani no maa adwuma sononko a agyinatukuo no, ayɛ no ɔha mu nkyekyɛ mu aduoson
Yɛatumi adu yɛn botae no ho kakra nanso, yɛwɔ nneɛma atitiriw binom a egu so reko tia galamsey ɔko no.
ɔtwerɛfo a ɔda agyinatukuo no ano no, Charles Bissue sei, wɔhuu no wɔ nyɛe bi mu sɛ ɔregye adaamudeɛ ama obi nkrataa de akɔyɛ amenamutu adwuma no.

ɔkwan a wɔfa di amenamutufoɔ yi a wɔakye wɔn asɛm wɔ asɛnnibea ahorow no nso resɛe asɛm no koraa, asɛnnie no nkɔ ntɛm
Deɛ ɛsan bɛsɛe nneɛma koraa yɛ mfidie a wɔde tutu fam a nansa yi ara ayera no
Otitenani a ɔda agyinatukuo no ano, Prof. Frimpong Boateng kyerɛ sɛ, mfidie a wɔde tutu fam a wɔgyee no ayera.
Berɛ a na dwumadie no rekɔ so wɔ afe 2017 ne 2019 ntam no, wɔgyee mfidie a wɔde tutu fam ahanum firii amenamutufoɔ yi a ɔnam mmara kwan so yi.
Wɔde kosii apolisifoɔ atenabea sɛdeɛ mmara kyerɛ no.
ɔman Ghana mu no, mmara a ɛbɔ amenamutu adwuma no ho ban kyerɛ sɛ nneɛma a yɛbɛgye afiri wɔn nsam no, ɛsɛ sɛ apolisifoɔ, asraafoɔ anaa wɔn a wɔbɔ ɔman no ahyɛɛ ho ban na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔhwɛ so.

Nsɛnkae ahorow a aba a ɛfa mfidie a wɔde tutu fam no ho ne kye a wɔakye nipa a wɔwɔ agyinatukuo no mu na ɔsan yɛ mfinimfini mantam NPP amanyɔkuo no titenani abediakyire no, Horaɔe Ekow Ewusi ne nnipa baasia bi a ɔka ho no, ɔrehwehwɛ anoyie afiri wɔn ho.
Adeɛ baako bio a na ɛkyere adwene koraa nso ne sɛ, sikafuturo ahorow a wɔgye firii amenamutufoɔ no hɔ nyinaa nso ayera.
Eyinom yɛ kwaadu ahorow a ɛsɛ sɛ ɔmanpanin Akufo Addo yɛ nhwehwɛmu fa ho, ɛfiri sɛ saa agyinatukuo yi hyɛ ɔmanpanin ase.
Sɛ obi a, madi amenamudwumafoɔ nsɛnkae akyi fi mmerɛ tenten yi nyinaa no afei na mate aseɛ deɛ enti a, na nnipa pii no ara reka sɛ, mfasoɔ biara mfi agyinatukuo yi mu mma.

Kuo no twerɛtwerɛfoɔ no, Charles Bissue, wɔahu sɛ wɔregye adaamudeɛ.
Aban kwantenkoro mmaranimni no reyɛ ne nsɛm no ho nhwehwɛmu.

Agyinatukuo no nso titenani no, Professor Frimpong Boateng nso no wɔakye no wɔ teipo bi anobaebae nkitaho a ɛkyerɛ sɛ ɔpɛ ɔne n’amanyɔkuo no nya mfasoɔ bi wɔ mfidie a wɔde tutu fam no a wɔagyegye no ho.

ɛwom sɛ ebia na ngudeɛ asoeɛ no antumi deɛ, nanso wɔn nimdeɛ ne ntease a wɔwɔ fa amenamutu adwuma no ho no bɛboa ama wɔatumi asi agyinatukuo no anan mu.
Sɛ wɔgu agyinatukuo no a, ɛsɛ sɛ nneɛma bi te sɛ Galamstop, durones ne lɔɔre ahodoɔ no nyinaa wɔde ma ngudeɛ asoeɛ no na etumi wɔn ma wɔyɛ wɔn adwuma.
mmarahyɛbɛdwani a ɔwɔ Temale atifi, Alhassan Suhuyini ahyɛ ɔmanpanin sɛ ɔmfa nneɛma ahodoɔ a wɔgye afiri amenamutufoɔ no hɔ nyinaa mmɛto dwa.

Kuo ahodoɔ binom adi kan ahyɛ aban sɛ ɔmfa ɔko a ɔreko atia galamsey nhyehyɛe no nyina mmɛto gua. National Democratic Congress (NDCɔ amanyɔkuo no nso kyerɛ aban no nna mfidie a wɔde tutu fam a wɔgye no nyinaa adi nkyerɛ ɔmanfoɔ

Benada no, berɛ a Alhassan Suhuyini suree sɛ ɔrekasa wɔ mmarahyɛbadwamu no, ɔkyerɛɛ sɛ ɔmanpanin a wɔayɛ n’adwene sɛ ɔde ne manpanyindie no bɛko atia galamsey adwuma no, anka ɔmanpanin bɛma Ghanafoɔ nyinaa ahunu nneɛma ahodoɔ a wagyeɛ, ɛyɛ lɔɔre, akodeɛ, ne sikafuturo ahodoɔ nyinaa a wɔn a wɔyii wɔn sɛ wɔnkɔko no agyeɛ sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ na yɛbɛhu baabi a emu biara wɔ.
ɔsan hyɛɛ mmarahyɛbadwa no sɛ anka ɛbɛyɛ a ɔmma wɔn nhunu sika bɔtene a wɔde hyɛɛ galamsei ko no mu, na ɛno na ɛbɛma wɔhunu sɛ, ampa wɔde ayɛ deɛ wɔhyɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnyɛ no a.

mmarahyɛbɛdwani panyin, ɛyɛ ɔko yi a yɛreko tia galamsey yi, anka ɛbɛyɛ a, mesusu sɛ anka mmarahyɛbadwa no bɛhwɛ na ɔde n’ani adi sika a ɔde reko ɔko yi akyi na watumi ahwɛ ampa sɛ deɛ wɔkaa sɛ wɔde sika no bɛyɛ no anyɛ biara wɔatumi de ayɛ.

NDCfoɔ ahyɛ aban no sɛ, ɔnkyerɛ mfidie a wɔde tutu fam ahodoɔ ne akodeɛ ahodoɔ a wagye nyinaa wɔ monnyae galamsey ko yi mu no.

Deɛ ɛbaa nansa yi ara yɛ deɛ wɔn a wɔfoɔ amenamutufoɔ dwumadie soɔ nso aka no (ɔonɔerned Small Sɔale Minersɔ.

Asɛm a mene no yɛ adwene nanso adwene foforo bi a ɛwɔ mu no nti
Ne nyinaa ne sɛ deɛ ɔkaa no sɛ akyire ɔbɛkyerɛ mu yie anaasɛ, anaasɛ adwene a ɛtaa akyire no nti no ɛsɛ sɛ metwe me ho firi ho koraa
Kataahyese ne yɛn atena firi tete na anya nsunsuansoɔ binom wɔ yɛn abrabɔ so.
Kataahyese biara nni hɔ a ɛsɛ sɛ yɛsosɔ so nanso yɛn man yi mu deɛ, yɛnhu no saa koraa
Yɛregye adaamudeɛ, sɛ ɛyɛ sika anaa ade foforo bi wɔ yɛn amanyɔsɛm mu, ɔman no dwumadie ahodoɔ mu, atemmuafoɔ mu, yɛn sukuu ahodoɔ mu ne yɛn nneɛma a yɛreyɛ no nyinaa mu
Nsunsuanso bɔne a kataasehyɛ ne porɔeɛɛ renya wɔ ɔman yi mpontuo so no nyɛ asɛm ketewa a ɛnam saa ama ɔman yi ntumi ntu mpon
Wo ara hwɛ sɛ, sika a ɛsɛ sɛ yɛde yɛ ɔman no adwuma no bi kodi nkurɔfoɔ nsɛm na ɛnam kɔnterate nti na nsuo kɛkɛ nnipa nnya bi nnom.
Hwɛ sɛdeɛ kataasehyɛ resɛe ɔman yi toɔ wɔ yɛn asoeɛ asoeɛ, nnwumakuo ne ɔfesese ahodoɔ a ɛmma ɔman yi ntumi ntu mpon
Eyi mma no nyɛ nwanwa deɛ nti dawubɔ ne nneɛma ahodoɔ a amamnyɔkuo ahodoɔ a wɔwɔ ɔman no mu reyɛ de ako atia galamsey no nyinaa atɔ nsuo mu no
Aban no hyɛɛ bɔ ɛfiri 1992 sɛ ɔbɛko atia kataasehyɛ nanso yɛnhuu nsunsuansoɔ mapa biara atumi afiri mu aba
ɛnam saa nti na yɛhu no sɛ aban kwantenkoro ɔfese a NPP aban no bɛbuee no bɛboaa ama anka yɛatumi asi kataasehyɛ ano kwan nanso no ade papa biara mpo antumi amfiri mu amma
Onipa a yɛde no too saa beaɛ no ano no yɛ deɛ odi ne ho ni, ɔpɛ adwuma na onim n’adwuma nanso sɛ na ɔte saa berɛ a na onni aban mu no
Anaa anka ɛsɛ sɛ yɛgyae no na anka ɔyɛ ‘Citizen vigilante’, anka saa berɛ yi deɛ anka watumi agye Woyome sika no ne afoforo bi deɛ nyinaa
Eyi nso nkyerɛ sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ yɛtwee twee ɔfese no, ebia na afei na ɔrebɛyɛ adwuma, nanso mfeɛ mmiɛnsa yi a yɛanhu hwee, ɛnna ɛma medi abooboo
Ebi nso a amanyɔsɛm a yɛde awurawura kataasehyɛ ko a yɛreko wɔ ɔman no mu no nso na ɛmmoa ɔman no wɔ kwan biara so
Kataasehyɛ ho nsɛm yɛ adeɛ enni kwan sɛ yɛtoto n’ase koraa wɔ ɔman yi mu koraa
Eyi nso nyɛ adeɛ a nnipa a wɔyɛ amanyɔfoɔ nko ara na wɔde wɔn ho gyegye mu na mmom ankorɛankorɛ bi ne adwumakuo binom de wɔn ho gyegye kataasehyɛ yi mu
Mma wo werɛ mfiri sɛ deɛ ɔde rema ne deɛ ɔregye nyinaa ayɛ bɔne
Asɛ yɛbɛyɛ kataasehyɛ ho anomaa konkonene a abere biara no yɛpɛ sɛ yɛtua berɛ mpo a wɔmmisa yɛn
ɔman no aman a wɔretu de ako atia kataasehyɛ no, mehu no sɛ yɛwɔ ani dodow ɛsɛ sɛ yɛpagya mu kakra
Yɛn tease a yɛwɔ fa kataasehyɛ ho no wɔ fam ɛno nti ɛma nneyɛe bi wɔ hɔ a yɛgye tom
Gye sɛ yɛgyae, ɔko a yɛreko atia galamsey no ɛsan atɔ nsuo mu bio, yɛn suo no ani redan kɔkɔɔ, mfidie a yɛde te nsuo no ani no resɛe
Amenamutu adwuma yi a ɛnnam mmara kwan so yi a yɛsan frɛ no Galamsey yi a ɛrekɔ so yi, mehu no sɛ ɛyɛ kataasehyɛ nti na ɛgu so kɔ so no anaasɛ yɛn ara agye atom sɛ yɛne no bɛtena.
Ayɛ sɛ asɛm a yɛka no daa sɛ, daa dua a aka wɔ wiase no bɛwu no, nipa wɔaka no nso bɛwu no ɛno na ɛmma yɛnhu sɛnti no bio no
Nsɛntwerɛfoɔ ne aban no kaa wɔn ntoma paa ano sɛ wɔde reko atia galamsey no, wɔyɛɛ adeɛ nanso ankɔ si aga.
Galamsey ko no yɛ deɛ ɛhia pa ara a ɛnni kwan sɛ yɛtoto no ase koraa.
Yɛn kwae ne yɛn nsuo ahodoɔ nyinaa resɛe
Nansa yi ara nsuo a ɛho akɔ atwee wɔ mfinimfini mantam mu no, ɔape ɔoast no kyerɛ me sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ yɛsɔre
Kaseɛ a ɛbaa no kyerɛ sɛ galamseyfoɔ adwuma na ama mfidie a wɔde te nsuo no ani no bi resɛe a ɛnam so nti no ɛsɛ sɛ wɔte nsuo no kyɛ no so, a ɛkyerɛ sɛ mmerɛ rekɔ n’anim no wɔbɛgyae nsuo no kyɛ koraa
Kaseɛ a ɛoyNews kasamafoɔ a ɔwɔ mfinimfini mantam de bɛtoo dwa kyerɛ sɛ Sekyere Hermang afidie a a ɔde te nsuo no mu no mu, atɛkye ne efi ahyɛ no ma
Nti mebisa sɛ, ɔko a yɛreko atia galamsey no yɛredi nkoguo anaa? Megye di
ɛfiri sɛ, nsuo a ɛbɛka akyiri no nyinaa we a, nipa a waka no nso bɛwu
Ayɛ sɛ mereka no dodo nanso mede galamsey nsunsuansoɔ no nyinaa bɛhyɛ kataasehyɛ
Ne mmienu nyinaa yɛ adeɛ a a ɛsɛ sɛ yɛko tia nanso ɛyɛ me sɛ yɛredi nkoguo
ɔmanpanin Akufo Addo yɛe sɛ ɔreko saa ɔhaw yi nanso mehu no sɛ galamsey mmom na ɔne yɛn reko
Yɛtetee kuo ahodoɔ bi te sɛ GalamStop, asoeɛasoeɛ agyinatukuo, Operations akuo ahodoɔ sɛ wɔmmɛko ntia kataasehyɛ nanso emmu biara antu annyina
ɔkwan yi boaeɛ kakra nanso yɛn nsuo ani te sɛ deɛ ɛte no ara ɛnam ankorɛankorɛ bi sika a ɔpɛ no nti no ɔman no nyinaa mmɔ
Ekuo ahodoɔ a yɛyii wɔn sɛ ɔmmɛko ntia galamsey no adan sika gyegye kuo a ɔnam ɔman no ho regye adaamudeɛ

Aberɛ a temanmufoɔ nyinaa agye saa abrabɔ yi ato mu na wɔrema kwan ama wɔn a wɔmfiri ɔman yi mu de wɔn ho gye mu, aberɛ a wɔwɔ nnipa binom a wɔwɔ tumi na wɔredi yie wɔ wɔn nkurow mu na wɔnni adwene pa ma Ghana, yɛgyegye wɔn so
Akwan ahodoɔ nso a yɛfaa so sɛ yɛde reko ɔhaw yi nso no antumi annyina ankɔsi aga
Yɛbɔɔ mfidie a yɛde rebɛkɔ saa ɔhaw yi ho dawuro wɔ 2018 no mu nanso ɛrekame ayɛ sɛ yɛkɔdae no ɛyerae. Berɛ yɛbɛnya adwene papa bi sɛ yɛde bɛboa ɔman no, yɛntumi nsɔ mu yie na agye agu
ɔsoafoɔ a ɔhwɛ nsaase ne agudeɛ soɔ no, Mr. Asomah-ɔheremeh kaa no ɛbɔ 2019 mu sɛ, aban no atumi adu ɔha mu nkyekyɛ mu aduɔwɔtwe num ho wɔ ɔko a ɔreko galamsey no
Berɛ a wamfa adanseɛ biara amma amɛsi deɛ ɔreka no so dua. Menni nnyinasoɔ biara a ɛbɛma maka sɛ deɛ ɔreka no nyɛ nokware na mmom no deɛ menim ne sɛ yɛn nsuo no ani da so yɛ fi

Agudeɛ ne amenamutuo adwuma no mmara no kyerɛ sɛ, sɛ ɔkye obi a, onii no anna afiase koraa no nyɛ mfeɛ 15 na enni kwan sɛ ɔkɔ boro mfeɛ 25 anaasɛ ɔretua 10,000 anaa 15, 000 nanso asoɔdenfoɔ no deɛ ɔgu so reyɛ adwuma no

Berɛ a soafoɔ a ɔhwɛ nsaase ne agudeɛ soɔ no hyia nsɛntwerɛfoɔ no ɔde too dwa sɛ, amenamutuo adwuma no maa ɔman yi Amɛrika sika no ɔpepepem 1.3 wɔ 2019 mu ɛnna ɛde nnwuma 26, 425 baa amenamutuo adwuma no mu

Sɛ wohwɛ nneɛma pa a ɛwɔ amenamutuo adwuma no mu a, anka ɛbɛtumi aboa atwe sika abrɛ ɔman yi na asan ama no atu mpon pa ara sɛ yɛrefa mmara kwan so de ayɛ a. Nanso no kwan biara nni hɔ a galamsey no yɛbɛtumi atoto no yie
ɔko a yɛreko tia saa nnneɛma abien yi, kataasehyɛ ne galamsey yi a ɛmma yɛnkɔ yɛn anim yi, ɛsɛ sɛ yɛhwɛ na yɛtumi di so
Nsuo ne kwae ho a ehia no yɛntumi ntoto no ase, ɛno nti no aberɛ biara no ɛsɛ sɛ yɛbɔ ho ban
Galamsey ne kataahyɛ wɔ nsunsuansoɔ bɔne wɔ yɛn man yi mpontuo so, na sɛ yɛtumi so ano ntɛm de a, ɛbɛboa yɛn pa ara
ɛsɛ sɛ kataasehyɛ ano sie yɛ adeɛ a ɛsɛ sɛ edi yɛn tirim mu dɛm pa ara, na yɛtumi kyerɛkyerɛ nneyɛe pa a ɛsɛ sɛ yɛn manfoɔ bɛdan no adi wɔ yɛn sukuu ne ɔsom bea ahorow nyinaa mu
Asotwe mapa a nhinhim biara nni mu na ɛsɛ sɛ yɛde ma obi biara a ɛbɛfom
Sɛ mmara yɛ adwuma yie a, na yɛkyekye wɔn a wɔnnam mmara kwan so reyɛ nnwuma no a, eyi bɛbɔ afoforo hu ama sɛ wɔpɛ sɛ wɔyɛ biribi saa a, wɔbɛtwe wɔn ho afiri mu
Enni kwan sɛ yɛtena hɔ na nhyira a yɛanya wɔ yɛn nsaadeɛ mu no dan nnomee ma yɛn.
Nsuo yɛ nkwa momma yɛntena ase nyɛ nhwɛ hann
Onyame nhyira yɛn man yi na ɔman no yɛ kɛseɛ

Afei deɛ ayɛ sɛ mfidie a wɔde tutu fam 500 no a wɔgyee no berɛ a na wɔreko tia galamsey wɔ afe 2017 ne 2018 no mu no nyerae te sɛdeɛ na ɔsoafoɔ a ɔda asoeɛ asoeɛ no agyinatukuo no ano no, Professor Frimpong Boateng reka no
Nnipa binom a wɔka amenamutu adwuma nketewa kuo a ɛwɔ Ghana no kyerɛ sɛ wɔnim baabi a wɔde saa mfidie no akɔgu.
Ekuo no baanodani, Richard Kojo Peprah ne Citi News rekasa no ɔkaa sɛ, wɔn nkurɔfoɔ no bi dii mfidie a wɔde tutu fam no akyi kɔɔ mmeaɛ binom a wɔtu agudeɛ no bi wɔ ɔman yi mu.
Yɛhuu saa mfidie yi bi wɔ Tamale. Mfidie yi binom wɔ adeɛ bi wɔ ho a ɛma yehu baabiara a ɛwɔ
ɛno nti yɛtumi dii akyire
Sɛ wɔfa afidie no wɔ Asante mantam no mu a, na wɔde kɔ atifi mantam no mu
Wɔde reyɛ adwuma foforo binom
Wɔde ebi nso reyɛ galamsey
Asoeɛ asoeɛ agyinatukuo no titenani Professor Frimpong Boateng kyerɛ sɛ mfidie a wɔde tutu fam no ayera.
Yɛresi deɛ ɔsoafoɔ no kae no so dua, ɔsee, yɛgyee mfidie a wɔde tutu fam no na yɛde kɔɔ mansin ahodoɔ no asɛmbili, mfidie yi yeraa firii asɛmbili ahodoɔ a yɛde kosisii no.
Nsɛntwerɛfoɔ kuo ne Oɔɔupy Ghanafoɔ sɛ, wɔhia nkyerɛkyerɛmu afiri aban no hɔ ɛkwan a ɛnam so a saa mfidie yi tumi yerae
Saa ekuo mmienu yi kyerɛ sɛ, ɛyɛ mpaninfoɔ yi asɛdeɛ sɛ wɔma mmara yɛ adwuma wɔ agudeɛ tuo no mu
Deɛ ɔboaboa dɔm ano ma nsɛntwerɛfoɔ a ɔreko tia galamsey no, Ken Ashigbey, kaa sɛ nnipa a, wɔwɔ saa nneɛma yi a ayera no nyinaa no, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔhwehwɛ no na ɔde asotwe mapa ma no
Sɛ yɛanhwɛ ama mmara a yɛwɔ no anyɛ adwuma a, anyammara sɛm no bɛtoa so
ɛyɛɛ dɛn na yɛnhu mfidie a wɔde tutu fam no bi
ɛyɛ asɛnhia sɛ yɛbɛhu abanmufoɔ anaa ankorɛankorɛ a ɔhyɛ saa ade yi ase.
Wei yɛ adeɛ a yɛhia ho mmuae
Asoeɛ asoeɛ agyinatukuo a no adwuma ne sɛ ɔbɛhwɛ ama amenamudwuma nketewa no nyinaa agyae na wɔahwɛ atoto wɔn ano ama wɔn tumi krataa
ɔmanpanin Akufo Addo bue saa ekuo yi ano wɔ Obenem, 2017 no mu sɛ ɔmmɛhwɛ na ɔnsesa amenamutu adwuma no mu na ɔnyɛ nhyehyɛe mapa bi mfa mma wɔn
ɔsoaf a ɔhwɛ nsaase, abɔdeɛmunyansapɛ. Mfidie ne mpontuo so, Professor Frimpong Boateng na ɔda ano
Forestry Commission kyerɛ sɛ yɛwɔ akukudam binom a wɔtaa saa galamsey adwuma yi akyi.
Kwae ahodoɔ a galamseyfoɔ yi asɛe no no mu baako ne Amansie Centralmansin a ɛwɔ Asante mantam no, galamseyfoɔ yi asɛe nsaase bɛyɛ eka nson
Bekwai Mansin no Forestry Commission no nnaanoni, Rexford Twum-Damoah ka kyerɛɛ nsɛntwerɛfoɔ sɛ, adeɛ no reyɛ agye nsam ɛnam sɛ ɛtɔ da a asraafoɔ bɔ saa galamseyfoɔ yi ho ban
ɔkaa sɛ, galamseyfoɔ yi, bɔ nnipa bi a, wɔwɔ tumi sɛ wɔn ne wɔn mpaninfoɔ
Kwae pii no ara a ɛwɔ ɔman no mu no resɛe ɛnam galamseyfoɔ a wɔsɛe nnua ne nsuo ahodoɔ tu sikafuturo nti no
Citi News‘ ɛonas Nyabor de too dwa 2019 kyerɛkyerɛ ɔman Ghana kwae ahodoɔ a emu nsaase yɛ bɛdeɛ a saa galamseyfoɔ yi asɛe sɛe no wɔ saa mfeɛ du yi a atwam yi no.
Saa kwae yinom ne Desiri, Kutukrom, Kobro, Oda, Jimira, Atewa, ne Tano-Offin a ɛwɔ Ahafo, Atɔe, Asante ne Apue mantan no mu.

Nsuo binom a ebi ne, Birim a ɛwɔ Apue mantan ne nsuo nkae no nyinaa a ɛfiri kwae ahodoɔ yi mu ba no nyinaa asɛe, a ɛnam saa nti no wɔn a wɔte ho mpo nnya nsuo nnom, ɛnna wɔn nso a wɔwɔ anaafoɔ fam no nso no bɛyɛ ɔpepemnum a ɔdan nsuo yinom no so nnya nsuo.
Anodisɛm no mu no, ɛdaa adi sɛ Forestry Commission kyee nnipa no bi a wɔreyɛ saa adwuma yi nanso ɛnam nnipa binom a wɔnim wɔn no nti no wɔgyae wɔn kwa
Accra High Court kyerɛ sɛ Nii Amanoo Dodoo, a ɔyɛ ɔgyefoɔ wɔ uniBank a ɛnte ase bio no bɛtumi abɛdi adanseɛ ama Dr. Kwabena Duffour a Sikakorabea no yɛ ne deɛ no
Wɔfrɛ Mr. Dodo sɛ ɔdanseni a ɔdi kan wɔ asɛnnie no mu, nanso mmaranimfoɔ a wɔdi Dr. Duffuor akyi no kyerɛ sɛ ɛmma asɛnnibea no mma kwan mma Mr. Dodoo nni adanseɛ
Dr. Duffour mmaranimfoɔ no kyerɛɛ sɛ, saa ɔgyefoɔ yi ato sikakorabea no mmara a ɛyɛ Specialized Deposit Act, 2016
Deɛ mmaranimfoɔ no rekyerɛ ne sɛ, ɔdanseni a ɔdi kan no, Nii Dodoo, nsɛ mfata sɛ ɔbɛdi adanseɛ ɛfiri sɛ ɔfaa no sɛ Unibank Gyefoɔ berɛ a ɔbɛkaa KPMG ho ma wɔdetee sikakorabea no akaunto no.
Mrs Yvonne Attakora Obuobisa a ɔyɛ Director of Publi Prosecution (DPP), sɔre tia asɛm yi.
ɔgyee too mu sɛ, kan no na Nii Dodoo ka KMPG ho, a ɛkyerɛ sɛ KPMG enni biribiara a wɔde ahyɛ uniBank mu anaasɛ onni diberɛ biara wɔ hɔ
Maame a ɔda Public Proseɔution ano yi gye gyinaa mu sɛ KPMG mmuu mmara biara so na Nii Dodoo fa a wɔfaa no no ɛyɛ ankorɛankorɛ bi na wɔfaa no na na ɛnam mmara kwan so
ɔka kaa ho sɛ, ne a na ɔne KPMG ayɛ adwuma pɛn no nkyerɛ sɛ, Bank of Ghana ntumi mfa no sɛ, ɔnkɔyɛ ɔgyefo mma uniBank.
Mrs Obuobisa kyerɛɛ sɛ, fa a wɔfaa no sɛ ɔgyefoɔ no nam mmara kwan so ɛno nti no wɔmmɔ wɔn asɛm no ngu.
Justice Bright Mensah, Court of Appeal temmuani a na ɔno nso te hɔ sɛ High Court temmuafoɔ no nso kaa sɛ, fa a a DPP faa no Nii Dodoo no nyɛ adeɛ a ɛnnam mmara kwan so.
Faa a ɔfaa no no nam mmara kwan so

ɔkaa sɛ, section 59 of the Evidence Act no kyerɛ onipa a ɔntumi nni adanseɛ wɔ asɛnnibea, a ɛyɛ obi a kasa ho yɛ no den, anaasɛ ɔkasa a nnipa nte aseɛ papa anaasɛ ɔhia obi a ɔte ɔno nko ara asɛm ase, anaa ɔnte sɛdeɛ yɛdi adanseɛ wɔ asɛnnibea no ase.
ɔtemmuafoɔ Mensah kaa sɛ, ɔhu no sɛ ɔdanseni no yɛ obi a ɔbɛtumi adi adanseɛ ɛnam sɛ ɔnim biribi fa deɛ ɛrekɔ soɔ no ho.
ɔka kaa ho sɛ, ɔfa a ɔfaa no no no no nam mmara kwan so
ɔsan kaa bio sɛ A1, A2 ne A4 ama asɛnnibea no ahu sɛ adanseɛ a wɔrebɛdi no deɛ ɛnteɛ bi frafra mu ɛnam sɛ wɔantumi anka hwee amfa anodisɛm a ɛbaa no ho
ɔtemmuafoɔ no kaa sɛ, akyinneɛ yi yɛ deɛ emu da hɔ fann, ɛno nti no yɛntumi nka sɛ ɔkwan a yɛrefa so no nneɛma bi a ɛnnyɛ abɛfrafra mu
Na Court of Appeal temmuafoɔ no kaa sɛ, asɛm yi yɛ deɛ ɛmfa asraafoɔ ho ɛno nti no ɔyɛ obi a ɔbɛtumi adi adanseɛ yie.
Afei asɛmnibea no kɔ kyerɛɛ no ɔgyefoɔ no sɛ ɔnka ne ntam na ɔnhyɛ n’adansedie no ase
Wɔde kwaadu aduɔson baako abɔ Dr. Kwabena Duffour ne nnipa nwɔtwe bi ɛnam dwuma bi a wɔdii a ama sikakorabea no agu no

Ghana sikakorabea kuo no kyerɛ sɛ wɔyɛ krado sɛ Bank of Ghana bɛma wɔn akwankyerɛ na wɔama nnwuma kuo binom a wɔgyegye sika no agyae sika binom a wɔgye wɔn adwadifoɔ hɔ no ɛnam nneɛma bi a wɔyɛ ma wɔn no nti
Ekuo yi ani nnye ho sɛ sikasie nnwuma ahodoɔ no bɛgyae sika a ɔte wɔ sevines akaunt so de yɛ nsiesie adwuma no
Berɛ a ɔne Citi News rekasa no, ekuo no anobaanodani, John Awuah, kyerɛkyerɛ sika a ɔte firi sevines akaunt mu no, ɔkyerɛɛ sɛ sevines akaunto no bi wɔ hɔ a, ɛne karɛte akaunto no bi bɔ mu
Wɔn a wɔpɛ wɔn no mpo nyɛ wɔn a wɔwɔ sikakorabea adwuma no mu no, na mmom wɔn a wɔyɛ sika ho adwuma nyinaa
ɛnam saa nti na yɛfoa, nyɛ ne nyinaa deɛ na mmom no sɛ wɔntwa saa ntetee no mu
ɛsɛ sɛ yɛne adwadifoɔ no di no yie
Sevines akaunto no nyɛ deɛ da biara yɛyi sika wɔ mu
Nanso yɛhu no sɛ nnipa binom de wɔ Momo wallet no ama no, na wɔn de wɔn ATM kaade no yi sika firi wɔn akaunto no mu

Eyi ma akaunto no nhyehyɛe no tɔ nsuo mu. Deɛ sikakorabea no reka ne sɛ, sɛ adwadifoɔ de wɔn akaunt a wɔhyɛ sɛ ɔde resie sika ayi no daakye di dwuma sɛ akaunto a adekyee biara ɔbɛyi sika wɔ mu a, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔtua ho ntwama
ɔsan kyerɛ mu sɛ, ɛnam saa nti no wɔwɔ akwansideɛ kakra

CentralBank de nsɛm bi too dwa Fiada, Ayɛwohummɔ 18, 2021, hyɛɛ sikakorabea ahorow ne sika nnwuma binom a wɔgyegye sika sɛ wɔntwe wɔn ho mfiri nneyɛe nson bi a ɛma wɔn tete adwadifoɔ sika so ɛnam sɛ saa dwumadie no ne sikakorabea no no nhyehyɛe bɔ abira

Saa sika a teteɛ yɛ a CentralBank hu no sɛ ɛnam mmara kwan so na sikakorabea ahodoɔ no resi si adwadifoɔ no ne credit Insurance Premium Overcharges, Maintenance Fees on Savings Account, ne Over the counter (OTC) Withdrawal ɔharges ne sikakorabea binom rema wɔn a wɔ bɔ wɔn bosea de wɔn din aka deɛ wɔde sika no reyɛ no sɛ ɛyɛ wɔne wɔn dea no
Sikasɛm nimdeɛfoɔ, Dr Akwasi Atuahene, akyerɛ sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ Bank of Ghana tu anammɔn bi de si sikakorabea ahodoɔ no kwan wɔ wɔn adwuma yɛ mu sɛ wɔamfa saa mmara no anyɛ adwuma a
Fiada, a ɛyɛ Ayɛhumɔmmɔ 18, 2021 no Bank of Ghana hyɛɛ sikakorabea ahorow no nyinaa sɛ wɔnnyae ntwama a ɛde sika soɔ a ɛnam mmara kwan so no
ɛno ara mu no CentralBank nso hyɛɛ sika nnwuma kuo ahorow no nso sɛ wɔnnyae saa sika gyegyeɛ no anyɛ saa ɛmmoa sika adwumakuo no nyinaa
Saa nhyehyɛe weinom nyinaa no wɔhu no sɛ, ɛyɛ deɛ ɛnna kwan mu koraa na bio nso no ɛyɛ ɔkwan bi a ɔrefa so asisi adwadifoɔ ɛno nti eyi bɛboa abɔ adwadifoɔ sika ho ban

Saa nteteɛ yi a ɛnnam mmara kwan so yi a Bank of Ghana reka yi ne credit Insurance premium overɔharges, maintenanɔe fees on savings aɔɔounts, over the ɔounter withdrawal ɔharges, ne afoforo be a ɛkeka ho.
Nteteɛ nson yi a yɛreka ho asɛm ne deɛ ɛwɔ aseɛ hayi ne nhyehyɛe a BoG de ato ho
ɛnam atoyerɛnkyɛm nti no sikakorabea no hwɛ sɛ ansa na ɔbɛbɔ obi bosea no, na onii no wɔ nsiakyibaa a ɛfa atoyerɛnkyɛm ho sɛ ɛyɛ owuo, dɛ die anaa w’adwuma resɛe

ɛnam sɛ Bank of Ghana hu no sɛ, saa nhyehyɛe yi boa sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a sikakorabea ahodoɔ no nneɛma nnye ngu no nti no, sikakorabea no bi afa ho de gye sika binom firi wɔn adwadifoɔ hɔ a ɛrema wɔn bosea a wɔbɔ no kɔ soro pa ara
Wɔahyɛ sikakorabea ahodoɔ no nyinaa sɛ, wɔntwe wɔn ho mfiri saa nneyɛe no ho na wɔnni saa nhyehyɛe yi so
Sikakorabea a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔfa nsiakyibaa adwuma bi ntete yɛ adwuma no, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔfa saa ntete no a nsiakyibaa no de yɛ adwuma no nso de di dwuma
Sikakorabea ahodoɔ no nni ho kwan sɛ ɔgye nsiakyibaa sika biara a firi adwadifoɔ hɔ a wɔn adwene nyinaa ne sɛ, ɔreyɛ nsiakyibaa nhyehyɛe bi ama wɔn
Eyi nka sika a ɔnya firi nhyehyɛe a ɛda sikakorabea no ne nsiakyibaa adwuma no ntam
Saa sika yi a ɛyɛ ‘Aɔɔount Maintenanɔe Fees’ yi mma kwan mma adwadifoɔ ne sikakorabea no nni dwa

Bank of Ghana ahwɛ mu ahu sɛ, saa sika tetee yi ama nnipa pii no ara atwe wɔn ho afiri sika a yɛde to sikakorabea no mu. Na ama wɔn nso a wɔdwene sɛ anka wɔde sika bɛto sikakorabea hɔ a ɔbɛnya mfasoɔ wɔ so no nso agyae
Saa nneɛma ahodoɔ yi resɛe sikakorabea adwuma no na ɛretwe nkurɔfoɔ firi sika a na anka wɔde sie wɔ sikakorabea ahodoɔ no ho
Bank of Ghana ahu sɛ sikakorabea no bi de ntetee bi ato sika a adwadifoɔ yi firi wɔn ankasa akaunto mu wɔ sikakorabea no mu no
Deɛ ɔka fa ho nyinaa ne sɛ, ɔde eyi ato hɔ sɛdeɛ nnipa pii no ara mma sikakorabea hɔ mmɛyi sika na mmom no wɔde wɔn foonu ne kaade mmom na ɛbɛyi sika afiri sika korabea ahodoɔ no mu
Saa foonu ne kaade a wɔde yi sika yi nso nyɛ adeɛ a wɔnte wɔn sika kakra mfiri so
Berɛ Bank of Ghana refoa sikakorabea ahodoɔ no wɔ foonu sikasɛm dwumadie mu no, saa nneyɛe nso ma nnipa binom twe wɔn ho firi akaunto a ɔbɛbue no ho ne titiriw ne wɔn a wɔnnim foonu no mu yie
Saa nneyɛe yi nso nya nsunsuansoɔ bɔne wɔ Bank of Ghana so ɛnam sɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔhu nneɛma binom mu nti.
Wɔahyɛ sikakorabea no sɛ wɔntwe wɔn ho mfiri ntwatema bi a wɔde to adwadifoɔ so no sɛ wɔyi wɔn ankasa sika na annu deɛ wɔhyɛɛ sɛ wɔbɛyi no a
Bio, nso no sikakorabea ahodoɔ no, enni kwan sɛ ɔte adwadifoɔ a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔhu sika a ɛda wɔn akaunto mu wɔ sikakorabea hɔ no
Bank of Ghana asan ahu sɛ sikakorabea no bi wɔ hɔ a, wɔhwehwɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔrebɛbɔ bosea no de wɔn agyapadeɛ bi ba na wɔsesa yɛ no sɛ, ɛyɛ wɔne sikakorabea no deɛ
Deɛ ɛka ho ne sɛ, deɛ ɔbɛbɔ bosea no na ɔma no na ɔma no bɔ saa ka no ansa na wɔama no sika no

Saa nneyɛe yi a sikakorabea no bi dan no adi no ne bosea bɔ mmara a ɛyɛ section 7 ( Borrowers and Lenders Act, 2020 (Act1052ɔ no bɔ abira a ɛmma kwan sɛ deɛ ɔrebɔ bosea no no ne deɛ ɔregye bosea afiri ne hɔ no de wɔn din bɛto n’ade so
Saa nneyɛe yi ma nnipa twe wɔn ho firi akwanya a wɔwɔ sɛ anka wɔde bɔ bosea no ho ɛnam sɛ adeɛ a ɔde bɛsi akagyina mu no, gye sɛ ɔne deɛ ɔbɛbɔ ne hɔ bosea no de wɔn din to so
Seesei no sikakorabea ahodoɔ no, yɛasi wɔn kwan sɛ wɔne wɔn a wɔrebɛpɛ bosea wɔ wɔn hɔ no de wɔn din bɛto ade ko no ara ɔde bɛsi akagyina mu
Bank of Ghana asan ahu sɛ, sikakorabea no bi wɔ hɔ a, ntwama a ɛdeda bosea a wɔde ma adwadifoɔ no yɛ deɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔde nya mfasoɔ firi wɔn hɔ kɛkɛ
ɛne sɛ, ntwama yi wɔde ka ntetee a ɛda bosea no so no
Saa nneyɛe yi kɔwie sɛ, bosea no, adwadifoɔ ntumi ntua a ɛno nti no bosea bɔ ntumi nkɔ so
Saa nneyɛe yi sɛ sɛe adwadie a ɛkɔ so no
Wɔahyɛ sikakorabea ahodoɔ no sɛ wɔntwe wɔn ho mfiri ntwama a wɔama adwadifoɔ tua sɛ berɛ a ɛsɛ sɛ wɔde tua wɔn sika no boro so no a

Deɛ ɛteɛ ne sɛ, saa ntwama yi no ɛsɛ sikakorabea no gyeɛ berɛ wɔatwentwen ntwama no tua soɔ anaasɛ sika no ankasa na ɛnyɛ bosea no a ɔbɔɔ yɛ no ho sɛdeɛ bosea bɔ mmara no te no (section 55(3) of the Borrowers and Lenders Act, 2020 (Act1052)
Sɛ yɛhwɛ boseabɔ mmara no mu a (section 55 (20 of the Borrowers and Lenders Act, 2020 (Act1052) ɛsɛ sɛ sikakorabea no de ntwama bi a ɔgyina sika a ɔregye no afe mu no nyinaa so de biribi asi ho.
Seesei deɛ, wɔahyɛ sikakorabea no sɛ wɔntwe wɔn ho mfiri bosome ntwama a wɔde to bosea so no.
Deɛ ɔde aba bio ne sɛ, seesei no ɛsɛ sɛ sikakorabea biara ma yɛhu wɔn afe no ntwama sɛdeɛ Disclosure and Product Transparency Rules a yɛde bɔ bosea no teɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ
Bnak of Ghana asan ahu sɛ, sikakorabea no bi nnye nnipa a wɔde sika to anaa wɔyi sika firi afoforo akaunto no mu no ho asɛm. Wɔhu no sɛ, krataa a wɔtwerɛ so de yi sika no saa akwan no bi nna so
Saa nneyɛe yi ma nnipa binom a akaunto no nyɛ wɔn dea no de sika to afoforo akaunto mu na wɔatwerɛ ‘me ara’ wɔ baabi a anka deɛ akaunto no yɛ no dea no bɛtwerɛ ne din no

ɛnam saa nti no, onipa a ɔda Agriɔultural Development Bank (ADBɔ ano no, Dr. John Kofi Mensah kae sɛ, sikakorabea no rehwɛ aboa ama Ghanafoɔ a wɔwɔ kuadwumay no mu sika kakra de a de aboa mansin baako mfidi dwuma baako nhyehyɛe no a ɛfa kuadwuma ho no.
Mansin baako mfidi dwuma baako no, yɛn manpaninna ɛde bae, na yɛakɔ yɛ sikakorabea a yɛhwɛ kuadwuma mpontuo so no deɛ, yɛbɛhwɛ na yɛboa mfudeɛ ne kuayɛ a ɛwɔ dwumadie yi mu no
ɛne sɛ, mfidi dwuma ahorow no a wɔresisi no nyinaa akɔ yɛ deɛ ɛfa kua ho, nti no yɛpɛ sɛ yɛde sika hyɛ mu

Yɛadi kan de Ghana sika ɔpepem aduasa na ahyɛ abɔrɔbɛ no dua no mu

ɛnam saa nti no Ghanani biara a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔkɔ aduaba dua mu no, mmra ne ADB mmɛkasa, yɛbɛboa no wɔ sika fa mu, na watumi adua no nneɛma no na n’adwuma no angu
Yɛde yɛn ani asi Ghana nneɛma a yɛde ba abɔtene no so ne titiriw ne nneɛma ahodoɔ a yɛdua no

Dr. John Kofi Mensah a ɔda ADB sikakorabea no ano de ato gua sɛ, sɛ ɛbɛyɛ na wɔn a wɔnyɛn nkokɔ wɔ ɔman yi mu no bɛtumi ne wiase nyinaa nkokɔyɛnfoɔ de asi ani nti no, ɔde nhyehyɛe bi a yɛfrɛ no broiler value ɔhain sɔheme aba a, ɛbɛboa ama sikakorabea no abɔ wɔn bosea de ahyɛ wɔn adwuma no mu a, nsisoɔ a ɛfata bi pɛ na ɛda so.
Yɛde broiler value ɔhain sɔheme aba a eyi boa yɛde sika hyɛ nkokɔ yɛn adwuma no mu, eyi ma yɛde sika hyɛ berɛ a akokɔ no bɛhyɛ aseɛ ato de kosi berɛ a wɔbɛnyini a, kosi sɛ yɛde bɛkɔ adwamansoɔ.

Onipa a ɔda sikakorabea no nhwɛsokuo no ano, Mr Alex Bernasko de too gua sɛ, ɛwom sɛ COVID-19 sɛe nnwuma bebree no ara deɛ nanso ADB deɛ etumi bɔɔ ne ho mmɔden nyaa mfasoɔ ɔpepemɔhansia num wɔ afe mpem mmienu ne aduonu no mu na san de nhyehyɛe mapa baa de bɛboa n’adwadifoɔ.
ɔsan nso de too gua sɛ, sikakorabea no san de mfehyia mmieɛnsa nhyɛhyɛe bi asan aba de bɛhyɛ ne nnwuma no mu kena.

Amanneɛbɔ bi a UNICEF de mae wɔ Afrika Sahara anafo fam no kyerɛ sɛ, “Mmofra a wonnii mfe 5 no mu ɔha mu nkyem 38 pɛ na wɔwɔ awoda adansedi krataa.”

Nanso wɔ mmeae bi no, Elke Wisch, UNICEF adwuma kwankyerɛfo abadiakyiri wɔ Afrika apuei ne anafo fam no ka sɛ, “sɛ mmofra betumi akɔ ayaresabea anaa sukuu a, gye sɛ wonya awoda adansedi krataa ansa, nnyanka nso hia ansa na wɔn nsa atumi aka wɔn awofo agyapade.”

Saa mmofra yi dɔɔso sen wɔn a wosuro nnubɔne, a wɔyɛ ɔha mu nkyem 55, ne wɔn a wosuro mmonnaato, a wɔyɛ ɔha mu nkyem 44, anaa wosuro sɛ wobenya nna mu nyarewa, a wɔyɛ ɔha mu nkyem 24 no.
